description.hltext_display: SJ hyr in bussar för att klara jultrafiken
description.content:
SJ har problem att komma fram med
tågen när det är kallt och mycket snö.
Många tåg har blivit försenade
den senaste tiden.
Nu hyr företaget in bussar för att klara
av jultrafiken. Om tågen stoppas av snön
ska de resande få åka buss i stället.
– Vi hyr in bussar för att vara säkra
på att folk kommer fram dit de ska,
säger Johan Ingarö på SJ.
Under julhelgen kommer omkring
1,3 miljoner människor att resa med SJ.

description.hltext_display: Balloons owner may sue county
description.content:
Balloons Restaurant owner Bernie Simmons said Tuesday he has retained a lawyer and is considering filing a lawsuit to prevent Cayuga County from awarding the Emerson Park pavilion catering contract to an Ithaca-based company.
The county Legislature voted Nov. 16 to award the contract to H&J Hospitality, which runs Joe’s Restaurant in Ithaca. That decision brought an accusation of foul play from Simmons, who also submitted a bid.
In a letter to the county, Simmons’ lawyer, Joe Camardo, pointed out that H&J president Jamie Ciaschi filed for Chapter 13 bankruptcy in 2007. He questioned why Ciaschi did not disclose the bankruptcy proceedings during the bid process.
“If you didn’t give your personal financial statement, that shows you’re trying to hide something,” Simmons said. “They think they’re going to get piles of money from this guy and he can’t even pay his bills.”
Ciaschi filed for bankruptcy August 21, 2007, according to the bank paperwork. He finished making his payments in August 2010 and has a bankruptcy discharge hearing scheduled for Jan. 11.
“The 2007 chapter 13 filing is a personal matter which has been fully resolved,” Ciaschi said in a statement. “It had no impact on my corporations or the operation of my business and I have always maintained excellent credit with our business creditors.”
The request for proposals sent out by the county asked for a financial statement but did not specify whether it should be personal or business.
County Administrator Thomas Squires said that the county was looking for a statement from “the entity we were going to contract with,” in this case H&J. Ciaschi said he provided his company’s 2009 tax return.
Ciaschi talked to county officials in general about his personal financial problems when they visited his businesses in Ithaca during the bid process, Squires said. The county did not realize he had filed for bankruptcy, though, until after the vote.
“It’s a personal bankruptcy, not a business bankruptcy,” Squires said. “At the conclusion, it didn’t change our thinking on the business.”
Legislator Roger Mills, a member of the pavilion advisory committee, said he still stands behind his vote for H&J.
“It’s not the type of bankruptcy where you just walk away from (your creditors),” he said of the chapter 13 filing. “I think that gives a lot of credibility to the individual. I’m more concerned with where a person is going than where they’ve been.”
Simmons also pointed out that as part of the bankruptcy, Ciaschi owed about $400,000 to Tompkins Trust Company and that Emerson Foundation president Tony Franceschelli is a vice president at that bank.
The Emerson Foundation is providing $3.5 million in funding toward the pavilion renovation; Simmons speculated the two items are connected.
Ciaschi called that “a completely false accusation” and said he had not met Franceschelli until recently.
Mills, a retired banker who worked at Tompkins Trust for five years, called the connection “a coincidence.”
Simmons was unconvinced and said that Camardo, his lawyer, is “going to file some paperwork.”
“For me, (this) is a tough pill to swallow,” Simmons said. “It sounds crazy, but we never thought Bernie Madoff could have done what he did, either.”
Staff writer Justin Murphy can be reached at 282-2237 or justin.murphy@lee.net. Follow him on Twitter at CitizenMurphy.

description.hltext_display: 美媒体点评称赞李娜2010赛季表现
description.content:
来源：长江网
【长江网讯】 （新浪体育）北京时间12月22日消息，2010赛季已经圆满落下大幕，在新赛季还未到来之际，各路专家都用自己的方式为已经过去的2010年做总结。12月7日起美国《网球》杂志旗下网站TENNIS.com编辑Ed McGrogan在自己的专栏里陆续点评了世界排名前25位的男单、女单选手，回顾他们一年以来的精彩表现。今天他为读者们解析了中国选手李娜的表现。内容编译如下：
李娜澳网庆祝胜利
赛季最佳
今年初的澳大利亚网球公开赛中，李娜携手同胞郑洁一同闯入了四强，此前她连克沃兹尼亚奇和大威。但在半决赛经历了2盘抢七局以后，李娜败在了最后的冠军小威的拍下。
赛季最差
在迈入红土赛季以前，李娜经历了四连败，其中包括在印第安维尔斯(输给巴尔塔查)和迈阿密(输给巴辛斯基)两站皇冠级赛事中首战出局。
赛季回顾
再过不久，也许我们就会在世界网坛看到中国男子选手的身影，他们会赢得比赛的胜利，并且取得不错的世界排名。至少，中国姑娘们已经向世界证明了自己，尤其是李娜。除了在年初的澳网闯入四强以外，她还在伯明翰草地赛中夺冠，随后又闯入了温网8强，赛季末，她还在自己家乡进行的WTA皇冠级赛事中国网球公开赛中晋级半决赛。李娜在7月和9月取得了巨大的突破，而在其他的赛事中，她并没有太出色的表现，甚至在前几轮就被淘汰出局。但李娜总能在大型赛事中表现得让人信服。在转入职业生涯的第5个年头里，中国姑娘就闯入了世界排名前30.
结语
尽管这是她职业生涯年终排名最高的一年，这位28岁的中国选手仍然有潜力提升自己。李娜是一名大赛型选手，从不惧怕任何对手。与其他顶级选手脆弱的心理素质相比，李娜具有明显的优势。

description.hltext_display: Bundeswehr: Wo Deutschlands Panzer rollen – ins Museum
description.content:
Die alte Bundesrepublik war übersät mit militärischen Anlagen. Ein Besuch des Schießplatzes Munster und seines Panzermuseums.
Im Januar werden zum letzten Mal Wehrpflichtige zur Bundeswehr eingezogen. Theoretisch könnte die Wehrpflicht jederzeit wieder „aufleben“. Doch das Szenario, in dem das politisch durchsetzbar würde, malt man sich lieber nicht aus und zieht es vor, das Zeitalter der modernen Massenheere endgültig für beendet erklären. Heute schickt die „Zivilgesellschaft“ militärische Profis zu den Krisenherden dieser Welt.
Munster – Auf dem Weg zum Museum
Foto: picture-alliance / dpa Zum Truppenübungsplatz Munster zwischen Celle und Soltau gehören eine Garnison und ein Panzermuseum (Foto).
Foto: picture-alliance / dpa/dpa Seit 1893 werden in Munster deutsche Soldaten ausgebildet. Heute ist es die größte Garnison der Bundeswehr.
Foto: picture-alliance / Peter Steffen/dpa Auf den Schießplätzen kann die Bundeswehr ihre schweren Waffen erproben. Zum Beispiel den Kampfpanzer Leopard 2.
Foto: picture-alliance / Peter Steffen/dpa Grenadiere üben den Einsatz mit dem Schützenpanzer Marder.
Foto: picture-alliance / Peter Steffen/dpa Der Flugabwehrkanonenpanzer Gepard wird gegen Flugzeuge und Hubschrauber eingesetzt.
Foto: picture-alliance / Peter Steffen/dpa Der Waffenträger Wiesel dient häufig als Aufklärungs- und Feuerleitfahrzeug.
Foto: picture-alliance / Peter Steffen/dpa Der Spähwagen Fennek wird bei der Aufklärung eingesetzt.
Foto: picture-alliance/ dpa/dpa Ein Zug Panzerhaubitzen 2000 übt das Feuern in Salven.
Foto: picture-alliance / akg-images Hitler – hier mit den Generälen Blomberg und Fritsch bei einem Manöver 1935 – ließ in Munster seine neuen Panzer erproben. Außerdem wurde in Munster-Nord die Giftgasproduktion wieder aufgenommen, die schon während des Kaiserreichs bestanden hatte.

description.hltext_display: Turkey warns US over Armenia genocide resolution
description.content:
The Turkish government has warned US President Barack Obama that a congressional vote on a resolution recognising the massacre of Armenians during World War I as a "genocide" could severely damage relations, the Turkish press reported Tuesday.
The US House of Representatives has tentatively planned a vote on the resolution for Tuesday, just before the 111th congress concludes. In March, the non-binding resolution was passed by a 23-22 vote in the House's Foreign Affairs Committee, a move Turkey protested by withdrawing its ambassador to Washington for one month.
Armenians contend that up to 1.5 million of their people were systematically killed by the Ottoman Turks in 1915. The US has approximately one million citizens of Armenian descent and the diaspora has rallied for recognition of the killings as a "genocide".
Turkey has long denied the genocide claim, saying the number of Armenians killed is much lower than claimed and that the deaths were the result of intercommunal violence at the time that also affected other ethnic groups.
The Turkish government and Turkish-American advocacy groups have engaged in an intense lobbying effort to prevent the resolution from going to a vote in the House.
On Monday, Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan sent a letter to Obama saying that the vote could cause a major rift in relations, according to reports in the Turkish press. "We are expecting that you will step in and intervene in Congress," Erdogan's letter reportedly said.
Although Turkey refuses to recognise the genocide claim, relations between the current Turkish and Armenian governments have slightly improved over the last couple of years.
In October 2009, the two governments signed accords to renew diplomatic relations and open their border. However, neither country has fully ratified the accords, and the process has stalled.
Ankara has warned that the passing of the genocide resolution in the US House could lead to a rupture in relations with Washington and could harm the already tentative reconciliation process between Turkey and Armenia.
The Obama administration has opposed the House resolution for the same reasons.
In 2007, then president George W. Bush successfully pressured the House not to bring a similar genocide resolution to a floor vote, averting a diplomatic crisis between Turkey and the US.
--DPA
kv
( 385 Words)
2010-12-21-19:21:09 (IANS)

description.hltext_display: 山西男篮高层恐发生变动 外教任主帅取代郜� �敏
description.content:
【长江网讯】 （搜狐体育）战绩不佳、且目前没有绝对大牌外援的山西中宇队依旧不乏吸引人的劲爆话题，目前，从山西队传来消息，“从今晚的比赛开始，外教帕特里克将担任球队的执行主教练，取代郜树敏。但是郜树敏还没下课！”
今天上午从中宇俱乐部传出，中宇俱乐部张爱华和郜树敏将双双下课的消息，为此，笔者联系上了终于俱乐部的几名工作人员，求证此事，得到的答案是确有此事，并且随后，他便向笔者透露了一些事情，“目前，我们球队困难很多，到现在为止战绩也不好，就拿下了一场比赛。从马布里的离开到现在的队内不团结，有很多事情令球迷和俱乐部大老板不满意了，因此可以说，郜树敏的执教受到了很多人的质疑，这是不容回避的事实了。”
可是难道说今晚郜树敏就要下课吗？对此，中宇俱乐部工作人员暂时给予了否认，“下课倒还没有，这个需要等待官方的消息，今晚的比赛，郜树敏将被架空，外教将出任临场指挥主帅，这也只是一个临时的决定。至于以后怎么发展，还不是很清楚。”
对于郜树敏的用人，该工作人员站在了球迷的一方，也是直接给予了否定，“这么说吧，俱乐部大老板都实在看不下去了，以前的好球员突然都不用了，俱乐部大老板跟郜树敏亲自说，谁谁是不是可以用了？谁谁状态真的那么出色吗？不要光用你那吉林队的几个了吧，可是郜树敏依旧还是任人唯亲，实在是到尽头了看来。”
山西中宇本赛季的调整可谓空前，中宇大老板王兴江为了让球队打进前八，将从吉林下课的张爱军、郜树敏请了过来，分别担任俱乐部总经理和球队主教练，随同两人加盟山西的，还有吉林队的三名队员。
中宇俱乐部总经理张爱军在联赛前放弃了独狼马布里，引发了球迷的不满。联赛开始后，山西战绩不佳，目前仅仅取得一场胜利，而且郜树敏重用自己的旧部，让球队内部矛盾日益尖锐，不少前山西球员直言最该下课就是郜树敏，现在连老板都坐不住了。上场山西客场打佛山，就让很多球迷不满，要求郜树敏下课的声音此起彼伏。
本赛季，山西中宇聘请了帕特里克作为体能教练，据悉，此人此前在NCAA混迹多年。经过这几个月的熟悉，帕特里克已经掌握了山西队的人员构成，他也很有可能接替主教练一职。
据悉，山西中宇内部人士已经透露，“不出意外，在今晚进行的CBA第五轮比赛中，郜树敏就要交出帅位。”一些队员表示，俱乐部做出什么样的决定他们都可以理解，“现在大家要做的就是努力训练，争取在主场可以结束连败的尴尬，究竟换不换主教练那倒不是球员现在去关心的事情。”
中宇内部甚至透露，郜树敏、张爱军下课可能很大，山西中宇方面并未给出官方说法，知青人士这样分析，二人共同离开的可能很大。知悉此事的一名媒体记者透露，“这是没有公开的事实，今晚出结果了，等着看吧。”

description.hltext_display: Winterchaos : Verkehrsminister Ramsauer wehrt sich gegen Vorwürfe
description.content:
Winterdienst im Stau: 16.000 Autobahnkilometer in Deutschland Quelle: dpa
HB BERLIN. Er habe intensiv Vorsorge getroffen, dass die Salzlager in Deutschland alle richtig voll seien, und er habe die Winterreifenpflicht eingeführt, sagte der CSU-Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. Allerdings habe er Verständnis, dass es "unglaublichen Ärger" gebe. Eine Winterreifenpflicht für Lkw, die über die für die Antriebsachsen hinausgeht, will Ramsauer derzeit nicht einführen. Griffige Allwetterreifen müssten auf allen Achsen vorhanden sein, betonte der Minister und fügte hinzu, jeder nicht ausreichend bereifte Lkw werde sofort aus dem Verkehr gezogen.
Verkehrsprobleme im Schienenverkehr räumte er jedoch ein und erklärte sie mit jahrelangen Versäumnissen bei der Bahn. "Wir haben mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrühren", sagte er. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden. "Es macht sich jetzt bemerkbar, dass man geglaubt hat, man könne sich das eine oder andere an der Reserve sparen." Diese baue man zurzeit in allen Bereichen der Bahn wieder auf. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. "Aber die Öffentlichkeit kann erwarten, dass die Politik zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht werden - und das tun wir."
Geschäftsführer des Städtbundes wehrt sich gegen Kritik
Auch der Hauptgeschäftsführer des Deutschen Städte- und Gemeindebundes (DStGB), Gerd Landsberg, wehrt sich gegen Kritik, der Winterdienst der Kommunen sei unzureichend. "Auch der Winterdienst hat eben organisatorische und finanzielle Leistungsgrenzen“, sagte er am Mittwoch im Deutschlandfunk. Das derzeitige Winterwetter toppe alles. Wegen fehlenden Gelds würden Nebenstraßen teilweise nicht mehr geräumt. Vielmehr konzentriere man sich auf die Hauptstraßen.
Das kommunale Straßennetz umfasst seinen Angaben zufolge 450 000 Kilometer, das der Autobahnen 16 000 Kilometer. Landsberg wies darauf hin, Streusalz könne in normalen Lagern nur wenige Monate gelagert werden, bevor es feucht und steinhart werde. Für den Bau von Trockensilos fehle Geld. Einige Kommunen hätten daher Verträge mit Salzherstellern geschlossen, nach denen innerhalb von 48 Stunden Nachschub geliefert werde. Das funktioniere aber nicht, weil die Lkw in Staus stünden.
Vielmehr lieferten Firmen aus Italien oder Kroatien Salz an, aber zu anderen Preisen. Es werde gezockt: Normalerweise koste eine Tonne Salz 70 bis 80 Euro, derzeit würden 250 bis 300 Euro pro Tonne gezahlt. Landsberg nannte als Beispiel für den hohen Salzverbrauch in diesem Winter die Stadt Bonn. Gewöhnlich benötige die Stadt für einen ganzen Winter 900 Tonnen Salz. Jetzt seien schon 1300 Tonnen gestreut. 50 000 Tonnen Salz würden pro Tag in Deutschland produziert.
Landsberg betonte, es gebe eine gesetzliche Verkehrssicherungspflicht. Nach heftigen Schneefällen könne jedoch nicht erwartet werden, dass die Straßen am folgenden Morgen vollständig geräumt seien. Man werde sich wohl daran gewöhnen müssen, wie in Skandinavien auf schneebedeckten Straßen fahren zu müssen.
Die Bundesregierung habe Hoteliers entlastet, aber für die Kommunen nichts getan, monierte Landsberg. Extreme Winter seien nicht einkalkuliert. Noch nicht einmal die auf 3,5 Milliarden Euro geschätzten Schäden des letzten Winters seien vollständig beseitigt.

description.hltext_display: Queensland's big wet continues
description.content:
Queenslanders are preparing for a wet Christmas with up to 500mm of rain forecast for coming days.
Parts of far north Queensland have copped a drenching over the past few days and forecasters warn the region, along with the state's entire east coast, is in for more of the same.
In Brisbane, ferries were cancelled because of debris in the river, and cars in low-lying areas were wrecked by localised flooding on Wednesday.
Senior forecaster Brett Harrison says Queensland's entire east coast, from the far north to Brisbane, can expect very heavy rainfall into next week.
He says more rain is expected from a trough off the central coast, affecting communities from Mackay south to Rockhampton.
And a low-pressure area around the Solomon Islands is also expected to move towards the northern coast in the next couple of days, affecting the area from Cairns south to Townsville.
However, there's only a very slim chance of it developing into a cyclone.
"It's expected to move quickly and it's not in a very good environment at the moment to intensify," Mr Harrison said.
He said Christmas Day would be wet across most of the state, especially along the east coast.
Premier Anna Bligh urged Queenslanders to be sensible with 500mm of rain predicted between Bowen and Gladstone in the next few days, and 100 to 200mm in the southeast.
She urged people to secure their homes before going on holidays and heed warnings not to try to negotiate flooded routes.
"In the last two years we have seen 20 people die in Queensland as a result of floods. We don't want to see any flood-related deaths this Christmas," she told reporters on Wednesday.
"We are potentially in for some very extensive flooding, and I do appeal to people, please stay safe on our roads, take care. It could be very dangerous out there over the next three or four days."
On Tuesday night, four people, including two children, had to be rescued from a popular swimming spot after rising floodwaters trapped them at Josephine Falls, near Babinda, north of Innisfail.
That followed several other rescues earlier in the week of people trapped in southeast Queensland floodwaters.
A total of 25 councils across Queensland are now eligible for help under national disaster relief and recovery arrangements.
Estimated damage from the recent wet weather is estimated at $607 million across the state, but the tally is expected to rise as more rain falls.
Crop damage is yet to be assessed.

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.
The spokesman said: "On arrival, firefighters were bringing the two patients out of the smoke-filled house.
"As further crews were only seconds away, the first (crew to arrive) decided to leave the scene immediately with the child to take him to University Hospital in Coventry.
"While the crew worked on the child, a firefighter drove the ambulance."
The ambulance service spokesman said the second crew to arrive immediately took over efforts to revive the man before taking him to the same hospital.
"Sadly, despite the best efforts of fire, ambulance and hospital staff, it was not possible to save either the man or the boy and they were both confirmed dead shortly after arrival at hospital," the spokesman said.
Group Commander Mick Birch, of West Midlands Fire Service, said: "The incident involved an unattended chip pan left on a cooker in a rear kitchen, which sadly has resulted in an adult male and a male child dying from smoke inhalation. West Midlands Fire Service are keen to remind people that chip pans should never be left unattended.
"People never believe that a fire is going to happen to them until it does," Mr Birch said. "Sadly, a tragic accident occurred, which has meant that a man and a boy won't be seeing Christmas this year."

event_or_fact.property: Man and boy killed; man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left
unattended chip pan left on a cooker in a rear kitchen, which sadly has resulted in an adult male and a male child dying from smoke inhalation
man and a young boy have died; a chip pan left

description.hltext_display: चिंता न करें, PM महंगाई कम कर देंगे: रादुल गांधी
Council delays downtown parking vote
description.content:
AUBURN — Downtown drivers will still have to use the parking kiosks when they park on stretches of Genesee and State streets.
However, city officials are looking to facilitate a comprehensive discussion with private and public leaders to evaluate and possibly change the city’s downtown parking policies.
The Auburn City Council tabled a resolution on Tuesday that would have authorized a moratorium on the use of the kiosk machines for street parking downtown.
The vote delayed a decision on whether to essentially make parking free through the end of winter on Genesee Street between William Street and Loop Road and on State Street between Genesee and Dill streets.
Councilor William Graney asked to table the resolution about two weeks after he proposed the moratorium.
During the meeting, Graney said he wants to bring downtown business owners, city officials and representatives with the Downtown Auburn Business Improvement District together to discuss issues with downtown parking and possible changes.
“I’d like to meet with these merchants to see if we can come up with something,” Graney said.
A number of those merchants have aired their concerns over the past two days over downtown parking.
A few of them showed up to Thursday’s meetings to voice their opinions, with much of the public comment time dedicated to the general parking policies instead of the proposed moratorium.
Jim Daddabbo owns the Mesa Grande Mexican restaurant on Genesee Street, and he told
members of the council that he believes the city should revisit the downtown parking policy. Daddabbo said he understands the need for turnover among the parking spaces, which is why city officials say paid parking exists.
But He also said the people who abuse the system can still do it with kiosks.
“We have a system in place right now that punishes everybody because a few people abuse it,” Daddabbo said.
Downtown visitors have multiple options for parking. Some street spots are regulated by kiosks, which require a person to walk to the machine, feed the machine with change and take the ticket printed by the machine back to his or her vehicle.
Some downtown parking spots still have parking meters. The city also maintains a parking garage and multiple long-term lots in the downtown area.
Parking tickets cost $10, and Jon Robson said that’s enough to drive a customer away from a downtown business. Robson spoke during the meeting, but he and Mike Keegan – both of Auburn Document Centre – voiced frustrations on Monday as well about the downtown parking policies.
Robson said he has received letters from customers who will not return to the downtown business after getting a ticket. Keegan said there are customers in their 80s and 90s who have to slog through a snowbank three times to work the kiosk before coming inside.
Both said communities with vibrant downtown business often have free downtown parking and policies that welcome visitors.
“We talk about economic development, and then we put roadblocks in front of the people doing it,” Robson said.
In other news:
* Auburn residents aged 65 and older will not have to pay to register their dogs. The council approved changes to the section of the city code dedicated to dog licensing to account for the state’s decision to no longer handle any dog licensing duties.
The city has handled dog registration for years, and city officials say members of the public will not notice any of the changes.
Auburn Mayor Michael Quill requested the fee waiver be added for senior citizens. It costs $7.50 to register a spayed or neutered dog in Auburn, and $15 to register dogs that are not spayed or neutered.
Staff writer Christopher Caskey can be reached at 282-2282 or christopher.caskey@lee.net. Follow him on Twitter at CitizenCaskey.

description.hltext_display: "En 2011 habrá `tortas´ para encontrar dinero en los mercados"
description.content:
Félix González, socio director general de Capitalia Familiar EAFI
Tímidas subidas en la renta variable con un volumen de negociación bajo. El mercado “entra ahora en una fase manipulable y de maquillaje de cara a la última parte del año”, reconoce Félix González, socio director de Capitalia Familiar EAFI.
En declaraciones a Radio Intereconomia este experto reconoce que hay que ver “en qué medida tenemos confianza en la economía para garantizar un comportamiento mejor que el que hemos tenido”.
Pero ¿qué espera en 2011? González reconoce España “será una lotería el año que viene. Sólo en el primer trimestre tendremos que financiar 160.000 millones de euros por lo que la exposición al riesgo en nuestro país es muy reducido”. Este experto de Capitalia Familiar reconoce que “será un año muy complicado si no se produce un cambio radical en la política económica, algo que no prevemos. Desde el punto de vista financiero – tanto tesoro español, estado, autonomías o bancos- tendrán que ‘pelear’ para encontrar dinero en los mercados”.
Una situación que contrasta con otros países como Alemania “que sigue creciendo un 4%, no tiene paro y cuya mandataria está más pendiente de las elecciones regionales del próximo año”. Europa está muy lejos de eso “estamos solos y posiblemente España tendrá que recibir ayuda pero no por insolvente sino porque hay mucho riesgo de contagio”.
En este caso, González admite que los datos de EEUU han sido favorables “y el acuerdo de bajada de impuestos llevado a cabo por Obama supondrá un impulso de crecimiento de Estados Unidos con el que nos veremos beneficiados”.

description.hltext_display: Toyota Launches Redesigned Vitz; Models with Idling-stop Boast Fuel Efficiency of 26.5 km/L
description.content:
- (JCN Newswire) - Toyota Motor Corporation (TMC) announces the launch in Japan today of the redesigned "Vitz" compact car.
Since the launch of the first-generation in 1999, the Vitz has achieved cumulative sales in more than 70 countries and regions around the world - including many European countries - exceeding 3.5 million units(1). With more than 1.4 million of those units(2) having been sold in Japan, the Vitz is truly a core model of the Toyota brand.
The new, third-generation Vitz, developed based on a new definition of the ideal compact car to meet consumers' diversifying compact-car needs, features sharper styling as well as a compact exterior but roomy, refined interior; abundant utility; and outstanding fuel efficiency of 26.5 km/L - made possible by the Toyota Stop & Start idling-stop system - in the 10-15 test cycle of the Japanese Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism (MLIT). The result is a distinctive compact car that achieves performance equivalent to a vehicle one class higher in terms of quality, comfort, ease of use and affordability.
With four grades that emphasize unique individuality, 17 body colors and four interior colors available, the Vitz is a highly appealing next-generation compact that enhances the enjoyment of choosing the perfect car and the pride of ownership.
The exterior has been completely redesigned under the key design concept words of agility and sophistication. The result is a dynamism conveying the car's brisk and responsive handling as well as a sophistication expressing compact-car elegance and presence.
The exterior design achieves high aerodynamic performance (coefficient drag value of 0.285), contributing to high fuel efficiency and stable high-speed cruising.
The interior strives to create a form both sporty and comfortable. For example, padding that extends horizontally from the instrument panel to the door trim conveys roominess and creates a sophisticated feel.
II. New package provides both easy driving and a roomy interior
The compact length, just 3,885 mm, enables a turning radius of 4.5 m.
The interior length has been extended by 35 mm to 1,915 mm, creating a roomier space.
The front seats use a new frame that enhances seating comfort, and the rear seats have 35 mm more legroom to create a comfortable and relaxing space in the rear.
The rear seats fold in a 6:4 split, enabling flexible arrangement.
The vertical adjustment range of the driver's seat is now 60 mm (15 mm more than the previous model) and the seat slide adjustment range is 10 mm with 24 steps (8 steps more than the previous model), allowing the driver to achieve an optimal driving position.
III. Utility and enhanced performance ideal for a range of driving situations
The cargo space has been made 145 mm deeper, providing ample storage capacity. Also, a new adjustable deck board can be set at two heights: When set in the upper position small objects can be placed below, and folding down the rear seats can create an almost-flat luggage space.
A discreet sub compartment for storing the owner's manual is located at the top of the glove compartment, expanding storage space.
The passenger seat has a special plastic barrier that can be used to prevent handbags or other items from falling forward off the seat. Shopping bags and such can be hooked to the top of the barrier, which can also be used to keep an umbrella in place.
The new Vitz is the first vehicle in the world to use UV-reducing glass in the front-door glass that reduces 99%(3) of ultraviolet light, providing the same level of UV protection as wearing gloves(4).
The single windshield wiper works with an integrated washer nozzle that improves wiping performance.
The headlights automatically turn on and off according to exterior brightness.
The new Vitz is equipped with a color, rearview monitor that enhances visibility when parking, as well as an HDD navigation system that incorporates steering-wheel-mounted audio-system-control switches.
The Smart Stop package, featuring a new idling-stop function, mounts a 1.3-liter engine on a two-wheel drive model to achieve class-leading(5) fuel efficiency of 26.5 km/L. The engine restarts in just 0.35 seconds to ensure smooth and immediate acceleration from a stop.
The 1.3-liter models are now equipped with a 1NR-FE engine with Dual VVT-i (Dual Variable Valve Timing-intelligent). Pairing with a Super CVT-i (Super Continuously Variable Transmission-intelligent) transmission achieves outstanding fuel efficiency of 24.0 km/L (two-wheel drive models) and powerful cruising. The four-wheel drive models are also equipped with Super CVT-i for smooth cruising and higher fuel efficiency.
The front-wheel-drive models (with CVT) surpass the existing Japanese 2010 fuel efficiency standards by 25% and the four-wheel-drive models surpass the standards by 15%. All models in the series achieve emission levels 75% lower than the 2005 standards under MLIT's Approval System for Low-emission Vehicles, qualifying for incentives under the Japanese government's taxation system for environment friendly vehicles. As a result, the front-wheel-drive models (with CVT) qualify for a 75% reduction in the automobile acquisition tax and automobile weight tax, while the four-wheel-drive models qualify for 50% reductions.
A multi-information display located within the instrument cluster shows information including fuel efficiency, average fuel efficiency and possible cruising distance. Further, an Eco Driving Indicator that turns on when the accelerator is operated in an environmentally friendly manner supports eco-driving.
EBD (electronic brake-force distribution) and ABS are standard on all models.
The Vitz features an omni-directional compatibility structure to provide outstanding collision safety performance in the event of a collision from the front, side or rear.
All vehicles come equipped with SRS airbags for both the driver and front-passenger seats. SRS side airbags also provide chest protection, while SRS curtain-shield airbags aim to reduce head injuries.
The WIL (Whiplash-injury Lessening) concept has been adopted for the front seats, adding backrest-give and head and back support for more protection in the event of a rear-end collision.
A pedestrian-injury-lessening body has been adopted to minimize impact to the head and legs of pedestrians in the unfortunate event of a collision.
V. Four grades emphasize individuality and boost the joy of selection
The new and distinctive Jewela grade features exclusive body and interior colors and interior and exterior ornamentation with a plated finish to convey vibrancy. The Jewela also offers a selectable sophisticated silver-finish for the door mirrors and door handles.
The F grade has specifications designed to meet a wide range of needs including price, fuel efficiency, and comfort.
On the U grade, a leather-covered steering wheel and shift knob and heated seats that warm the shoulders and back are standard equipment to enhance comfort and sophistication.
The sporty RS grade has exclusive designs on the front and rear, including the bumpers and a roof spoiler. Various other equipment, including exclusive sports car style seats, a steering wheel wrapped in leather with dimple stitching, and a fun-to-drive five-speed manual transmission or seven-speed Sports Sequential Shiftmatic transmission with a paddle shift-type shift lever that provides manual-transmission feel.
The Lift-up Front Passenger Seat model is equipped with a front passenger seat that rotates and slides down and to the outside of the vehicle. The B type comes with a motorized device for loading and unloading a wheelchair as standard equipment.
A Welcab Friendmatic model allowing for the installation of a specialized driver's seat and devices is also available. This vehicle has special power steering as a standard feature that reduces the force needed for operation compared to the base vehicle, making the steering wheel easier to turn during initial acceleration and low-speed driving.
Supported by people around the world, Toyota Motor Corporation (TSE: 7203; NYSE: TM), has endeavored since its establishment in 1937 to serve society by creating better products. As of the end of March 2010, Toyota conducts its business worldwide with 51 overseas manufacturing companies in 26 countries and regions. Toyota's vehicles are sold in more than 170 countries and regions. For more information, please visit www.toyota.co.jp/en/index.html.

description.hltext_display: 汗流浃背
description.content:
释义：
浃：湿透。汗水流得满背都是。形容非常恐惧或惭愧。现也形容流汗很多，衣服都湿透了。
出处：
《汉书・杨敞传》：
敝惊惧，不知所言。汗出浃背徒唯唯而已。
典故：汉大将军霍光，是汉武帝的托孤重臣，辅佐八岁即位的汉昭帝执政，威势很重。霍光身边有个叫杨敞的人，行事谨小慎微，颇受霍光赏识，升至丞相职位，封为安平候。其实，杨敞为人懦弱无能，胆小怕事，根本不是当丞相的材料。
公元前74年，年仅二十一岁的汉昭帝驾崩于未央宫，霍光与众臣商议，选了汉武帝的孙子昌邑王刘贺作继承人。谁知刘贺继位后，经常宴饮歌舞，寻欢作乐。霍光听说后，忧心忡忡，与车骑将军张安世、大司马田延年秘密商议，打算废掉刘贺，另立贤君。计议商定后，霍光派田延年告诉杨敞、以便共同行事。杨敞一听，顿时吓得 ，惊恐万分，只是含含糊糊，不置可否。杨敞的妻子，是太史公司马迁的女儿，颇有胆识。她见丈夫犹豫不决的样子，暗暗着急，趁田延年更衣走开时，上前劝丈夫说；“国家大事，岂能犹豫不决。大将军已有成议，你也应当速战速决，否则必然太难临头。”杨敞在房里来回酸步，却拿不定注意。正巧此时田延年回来，司马夫人回避不及，索性大大方方地与田延年相见，告知田延年，她丈夫愿意听从大将军的吩咐。田延年听了后高兴地告辞走了。
田延年回报霍光，霍光十分满意，马上安排杨敞领众臣上表，奏请皇太后。第二天，杨敞与群臣遏见皇太后，陈述昌邑王不堪继承王位的原因。太后立即下诏废去刘贺，另立汉武帝的曾孙刘询为君，史称汉宣帝。

description.hltext_display: 醫衛協議 藥商：縮短臨床時程 (中央社)
description.content:
(中央社記者潘智義台北22日電)對「江陳會」簽署「兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，太景生物科技董事長兼執行長許明珠表示，可避免兩岸重複臨床試驗，有利於開發亞洲流行疾病新藥的藥商。
太景生技今天舉行記者會，許明珠特別看好「兩岸醫藥衛生協議」簽署後，可大幅縮短臨床試驗時程、節省成本所帶來的新藥商機。太景的新藥可望提早 5年，領先在台灣、大陸上市。
她說，江陳會簽署上述協議，要求新藥開發須以最嚴格標準進行，但大陸認可台灣已完成臨床試驗結果，兼顧安全與速度。中國是成長最快速的醫藥市場，太景早在2005年在當地設立子公司，並進行1.1類新藥、屬於非進口藥的1至3期臨床試驗。
另外，太景研發新藥奈諾沙星，可治療抗藥性黃金葡萄球菌，甚至糖尿病傷口發炎都能治療，並完成第 2期臨床試驗，再授權國際知名藥廠Warner Chilcott在歐美進行第3期臨床試驗，預計耗時2年，並在上述地區取得上市核可後，進行製造與銷售。
不過，奈諾沙星在台灣、中國大陸的 3期臨床試驗仍由太景進行，預計於2012年底在台灣與中國申請上市許可。991222

description.hltext_display: Results of OSCE chairmanship prove Kazakhstan's big role in international arena - Russian diplomat
description.content:
BRUSSELS. December 22. KAZINFORM /Dimash Syzdykov/ The results of Kazakhstan's chairmanship in OSCE prove that the country plays a big role in the international arena, says Ambassador of the Russian Federation to Belgium Alexander Romanov in an interview to a Kazinform correspondent at the reception held in Brussels to mark the 19th anniversary of Kazakhstan's independence and completion of the country's chairmanship in the OSCE.
The diplomat noted that the Russian side tried to fully support Kazakhstan as OSCE Chair. "We consider this is a big success for Kazakhstan, a confirmation of Kazakhstan's significant role in the international arena", Mr. Romanov added.
Touching on the theme of Kazakh-Russian relations he said that the level of bilateral contacts could serve as a model for other states. "I've paid several visits to Kazakhstan and I can say that we have old friendly relations. Our common purpose is to continue development of these relations", the Russian diplomat noted.
He also stressed that Russia attached much significance to the development of the Customs Union.

event_or_fact.property: Russia attached much significance to the development of the Customs Union.
the level of bilateral contacts could serve as a model for other states.

description.hltext_display: 图：大陆离台湾本岛最近码头即将动工
description.content: 12月22日，平潭对台高速客滚码头工地上一片繁忙景象，正在进行动工前的最后准备。总投资近二亿元人民币，用地面积165亩的福建平潭对台高速客滚码头工程，12月25日将正式动工，预计2011年8月前完工，建成后将成为大陆离台湾本岛最近的码头，届时将开通离台湾本岛最近的对台高速客滚直航航线。

description.hltext_display: 珠海九洲口岸圣诞期间增18个往返香港水上航班
description.content:
珠海九洲边检站负责人22日介绍说，在香港圣诞节3天假期内，该口岸水上客运部门将于24日至27日增开对港往返航班18班次，以缓解客流高峰。
其中入境11班次、出境7班次，航班总数达到162班次。具体增开班次为：24日20时、21时，25日7时、8时、9时、9时15分、10时、11时、12时、21时15分及26日10时从香港开往九洲港；25日8时30分，27日14时30分、16时30分、17时30分、19时、20时、21时从九洲港开往香港。
据珠海九洲边检站李少源介绍，香港圣诞节放假3天，将为内地水路连接香港的九洲口岸带来一轮出入境客流高峰。圣诞节期间九洲口岸客流将呈现出两大特点，一是香港旅客大幅增加，预计将占到总客流量的80%，他们大部分是利用假期来内地旅游、探亲、访友的；二是客流分布呈现出前段时间入境旅客多、后段时间出境旅客多的特点，九洲边检提醒旅客根据客流分布错峰出行。(记者魏蒙)

description.hltext_display: Auburn man accused of threatening city workers
description.content:
An Auburn man was arrested Tuesday morning after allegedly threatening two Auburn solid waste employees, city police said.
Larry Richard Houghtaling Jr., 30, of 92 E. Genesee St., was charged with second-degree menacing and fourth-degree criminal possession of a weapon, both misdemeanors.
According to the Auburn Police Department, the two solid waste employees were working a recycling collection truck in the area of Houghtaling’s residence when Houghtaling approached them and allegedly yelled at the employees for not collecting a bin of glass at his residence that contained remnants of a broken window pane.
At one point in the exchange, police said, Houghtaling, who was reportedly holding onto a shovel while yelling at the employees, came off his porch and began swinging the shovel at both men and nearly struck one of the men.
Houghtaling then allegedly said he was going into his home to retrieve his shotgun and went back inside his house.
Authorities said the employees retreated down the street and called police, but Houghtaling allegedly came back out of his house, grabbed a piece of glass out of the recycling bin and began walking toward the men shortly before Auburn police arrived.
Houghtaling was taken into custody and transported to the Auburn Police Department.
He was arraigned in Auburn City Court and remanded to Cayuga County Jail on $500 cash or $1,500 bond.

event_or_fact.property: he was going into his home to retrieve his shotgun and went back inside his house
fourth-degree criminal possession of a weapon

description.hltext_display: KTX 기장이 女승무원 폭행? "감히 건방지게 어디서…"
description.content:
[스포츠서울닷컴ㅣ김용일 기자] KTX 기장이 열차 안에서 술과 담배를 즐기던 중 이를 제지하려던 여승무원에 폭행을 가해 충격을 주고 있다.
코레일에 따르면 지난달 22일 부산에서 출발한 KTX 열차에서 기장인 김모(46)씨는 자신의 운행 근무를 마치고 해당 열차를 타고 귀가를 하던 중이었다. 그러나 당시 김모씨는 술에 취한 채 객실 밖 통로에서 담배를 피우고 있었으며 이를 본 승객들은 담당자에게 신고를 한 것으로 알려졌다.
신고를 접수받은 여승무원 A(28)씨는 현장에 도착해 김씨에게 사원증 제시를 요구했다. 그러나 김씨는 여승무원에게 "감히 건방지게 어디서…"라며 거부한 것으로 확인됐다.

description.hltext_display: “一柱香”还是“一炷香”
Hire A Copywriter Who Will Deliver The Best Results For Your Service Business
description.content:
Author : Cathy Goodwin
As a service business owner, you know you need to send a compelling message to prospects You need a website that communicates your message in a way that reaches your niche without sounding sales-y
But if you are a busy service business owner, you face a challenge You are busy seeing clients, so you don't have time to create your own content You might even wonder if you need to learn new skills: copywriting calls for unique styles of writing that aren't found elsewhere Often a do-it-yourself option is not unrealistic
So why not outsource your content creation? You need to find a copywriter You need to be sure your services will be represented accurately Your message needs to sound authentic to your website visitors
Therefore, it's not surprising to learn that these three words will send shivers down the spine of most business owners: "Hire a copywriter "
If you feel this way you are in good company My clients share tales of copywriters who
didn't "get" their message (and charged for revision) refused to listen to what they said wrote copy that seemed designed to induce sleep, not sales
and (most lethal of all) didn't make a difference to the bottom line
Why does this happen? And how can you avoid these outcomes?
(1) Begin with a bite-sized project
A complimentary "get-acquainted" call or meeting will be helpful - but you won't get a sense of how your copywriter works till you become a paying client
What's bite-sized? That depends on you and the size of your ultimate project A half hour "breakthrough" may be enough for a small project A longer project may require several hours of diagnosis and strategy
and that might be all you need for now
(2) Watch for these red flags:
-- a low-ball hourly rate I met "Adrienne" at a networking meeting She was thrilled to find a copywriter with a low hourly rate till she realized she was paying more than most of us would have quoted for the whole project
-- avoiding a project quote Get a written quote for the project - and ask how many revisions are included No surprises!
-- diving right into your project Trained copywriters will *insist* on getting background and diagnostics before they write the first word
(3) Call your copywriter early
Often copywriters will help you save on branding and web design Even more important, working with a copywriter can help you gain clarity on your niche and your strategy
Online copywriter Cathy Goodwin has the laser vision for recognizing the unique strengths that every service professional brings to the marketplace, and the skills to leverage them to attract more clients online. To help you choose a copywriter, she has written a guide: 7 Mistakes Most Business Owners Make When They Hire A Copywriter. Download immediately at Free Copywriting Tips

event_or_fact.property: a guide: 7 Mistakes Most Business Owners Make When They Hire A Copywriter

description.hltext_display: 小贷公司2010年业绩意外走红 盈利大涨约40%
description.content:
随着沪上小贷公司第二年试点的完成，根据现有规定，小额贷款公司3年以后可以转制成村镇银行，这意味着2010年的收益情况及对2011年的业绩预期，成了决定小贷公司命运的关键。
《每日经济新闻》调查发现，2010年沪上小贷公司的经营业绩意外红火，盈利大涨逾40%，但是各家小贷公司对转制成村镇银行前景仍觉得遥遥无期，并认为考虑到银行融资即将到期，2011年的业绩上涨恐难继续维持。
小贷公司利润大涨逾40%
自2008年11月26日，宝山区第一家宝莲小额贷款公司开业至今，沪上小贷公司试点已满两年。 根据小贷公司转制成村镇银行的规定，持续经营3年以上，近两个会计年度连续盈利，作为承前启后的一年，2010年各家小额贷款公司的经营状况备受关注。
当外界对小贷公司这个新生事物质疑重重时，《每日经济新闻》调查发现，2010年沪上小贷公司的经营业绩意外红火，首批成立的小贷公司利润大涨逾40%，青浦、奉贤等远郊区县甚至接近翻番，且不良贷款率为零。
“去年的利息收入约500万，今年有望达到800万。”宝山宝莲小额贷款公司负责人李跃如表示，“目前主要还是以5000万的自有资本放贷，如果能从银行获得融资，经营状况还会更好。”
与此同时，2008年12月12日成立的奉贤新发展小额贷款公司，今年4月获得上海银行和上海农商行的融资后，目前贷款余额为1.656亿，开业至今累计贷款近5个亿，相当于资本金翻了5次。
负责人袁洁弟透露，公司09年全年的利息收入约1300万，利润总额近700万，今年的利息收入则有望达到1900万，初步估算利润近千万，较去年上涨43%。
对于2010年业绩的提升，小贷公司负责人认为主要得益于较2009年更加充裕的现金流，包括2010年上半年融资问题解决，以及2009年股东放弃分红所积累的资金。
“2009年5月前我们一直在积累客户，直到年中资金才逐渐放完，此前沉淀在银行账户上的数千万资金，直到下半年才开始创造效益。”宝山神农小额贷款公司负责人杨晨辉解释说。
尽管如此，目前小贷公司账上依然所剩无几。“银行信贷从紧以后，找上门来的企业越来越多，因为本身的资金问题，不得不拒绝了很多客户。临近年末，贷款主要用于给员工年终发工资，或者为明年作原材料储备。”上述人士表示。
转制成村镇银行或将延期
随着小额贷款公司的业绩在试点第二年开始逐渐步入正轨，小额贷款公司转制成村镇银行也开始提上监管机构的日程，但接受《每日经济新闻》采访的小贷公司负责人均表示，不看好小贷公司3年后转制成村镇银行。
按照现有的规定，小额贷款公司转制成村镇银行需满足诸多条件，其中硬性要求包括：成立3年以上且连续两年盈利；不良贷款率低于2%；贷款损失准备充足率130%以上；转制后由商业银行控股。
据悉，以小贷公司目前的经营状况，前三项都能轻松满足，贷款损失准备充足率目前主要被“呆账准备金”所代替，各小贷公司用组合计提的方法，按照贷款余额的1.5%每季度计提一次坏账准备金。
尽管小贷公司的经营状况渐入佳境，但小贷公司负责人并不看好监管层短期内放行转制村镇银行一事。
“成立一家金融机构需要本着稳健的原则，经营三年后才算刚起步，转制成村镇银行恐怕要是5年以后的事情。”宝山宝莲小贷公司负责人李跃如表示，“监管层近期也很少提及转制一事。”
今年6月初，上海市金融办曾初步选定了浦东等3个区县进行转制试点，要求区政府在今年6月30日之前，将小贷公司转制方案先上报至市一级金融办。
有消息人士透露上述试点的三个区包括浦东、徐汇和杨浦，因三个区县均有国资背景的小贷公司，外界猜测这类小贷公司转制上有着先天优势，但上述消息并未得到金融办的证实。
业绩上涨2011年恐难持续
据了解，考虑到税收负担过重，再加上小贷公司本身就缺资金，目前沪上多数小贷公司的股东初步达成2010年不分红的协议。
据悉，因身份不明确，小贷公司纳税标准参照一般企业，利息收入的5.45%上缴营业税及附加，毛利润的25%上缴所得税。
“2009年缴了300万的税，2010年税收可能达到500万，如果再分红，自然人股东还要上缴20%的个人所得税，打消了股东们分红的念头。”一位不愿透露姓名的沪上小贷公司负责人表示。
尽管如此，奉贤新发展小贷公司负责人袁洁弟表示，公司2011年的利息收入可能会从1900万下降至1600万，“银行贷款到期前几个月公司必须着手收回贷款，如果再贷到款，还有一个发放的过程，前后会造成300余万的机会成本。”
上海市金融办的统计数据显示，目前上海地区小贷公司的平均年利率水平约15.1%，奉贤等区县略低，约为14.89%，有的区县则达到16%上下，不超过基准利率4倍的上限。
从贷款期限上看，小贷公司的贷款期限平均在6个月上下，以3―6个月的贷款居多，客户则以小企业为主。(印峥嵘)

description.hltext_display: 冬天感冒后 喝杯紫苏茶
description.content:
相传，古时的药草学家将紫苏视为神圣的植物，不洁之人必须保持距离，采摘者要身穿干净衣物，举办繁琐仪式后才可摘取。而两千多年前，我国最早的一部词典《尔雅》如此描述：取紫苏嫩茎叶研汁煮粥，长服令人体白身香。其实，优雅泛香的紫苏不仅是一味出色的香料，更是散寒解表的良药，冬季感冒后喝上一杯紫苏茶效果不错。 散寒发汗用紫苏叶
紫苏有叶、子、梗三类，紫苏叶性味辛温，具有发表、散寒、理气、止咳的功效；紫苏子则主要是下气消痰、润肺；它的梗能和胃降气，治疗胃气上逆。若是冬季受凉感冒，出现怕冷、四肢僵硬、酸痛、鼻子不通气、流鼻涕等症状，用紫苏叶散寒解表、发发汗，感冒能更快治愈。
泡水比熬煮更有效
很多人觉得中药煎水效果会更好，但紫苏叶却是个例外，因为它的药用部分主要是挥发物质，长时间熬制反而会破坏药效，所以用开水泡着喝效果更好。患上风寒感冒后，抓几片紫苏叶(约15克)用开水泡几分钟当茶饮，不久就会感觉身上热了，然后会有微汗冒出，通常3~5天就能基本治愈。
不过，由于紫苏叶对胃肠有一定的刺激作用，胃肠道不好的人最好不要空腹喝，可以在饭后饮用，或在喝紫苏茶之前，吃几块饼干饱腹。

description.hltext_display: 图：冬至彩饺喜感十足
Bamburullstolar till japanskt flyg
description.author: TT Tidningarnas Telegrambyr
description.content:
Japan Airlines (JAL) har kommit på ett sätt för rullstolsburna flygpassagerare att slippa tidsödande extrakontroller - rullstolar av bambu.
"Med en rullstol i bambu kan fysiskt utsatta passagerare färdas snabbt till gaten, de förblir sittande genom säkerhetskontrollen", heter det i ett pressmeddelande från JAL.
De sofistikerade fordonen går loss på 600 000 yen (50 000 kronor) styck, och införs på japanska flygplatser under 2011. TT Tidningarnas TelegrambyråTelefon: 08-692 26 00 Aktivera javascript för att se

The report describes data services targeted at specific market segments, provides the key to faster returns on network investments. The research provides the information on the operators that are now planning their network rollout and service strategies and discusses 3G launch strategies in India … . Banks are back in the market for global network services, with technology and manufacturing companies joining them as key innovators in communications. The report provides a detailed analysis of the global service providers...

The research discusses strategic objectives and the process of integration of newly acquired operations and stiff competition from regional and local players as key challenges … . The report provides a detailed analysis of how current MTRs were determined across the EU15 and look at how NRAs are taking the Recommendation into consideration as they undertake new market analyses. The research discusses EC recommendations aimed at harmonizing the charges across Europe … . This report describes the main HSPA+ enhancements brought by 3GPP R8, R9, and R10. It also offers early trends for these future HSPA+ options. The report provides technical overview of HSPA evolutionary options and mobile broadband connection forecasts for 2009-2015 …

description.hltext_display: 冬至到 麻糍香
description.content: 12月21日，在瑞安市大沙巷菜市场，林大妈一家正忙着制作麻糍。冬至，在瑞安有吃汤圆和麻糍的传统。(孙凛 摄)

description.hltext_display: 妈妈最拿手的菜
description.content:
我 是春卷，她做的春卷味道好极了！
妈妈做得很认真。她先做馅，馅里有鸡肉、鸡蛋，还有蘑菇和白菜。她把这些东西混合在一起，然后用春卷皮包起来。最后，在油里面炸一炸。炸完出锅的春卷热热的、香香的，吃起来外面脆，里面香。
我很喜欢吃妈妈做的春卷，因为它的味道特别好。我也想学做春卷。(季晶晶 11岁) 我最喜欢吃妈妈做的葱姜龙虾。妈妈做的葱姜龙虾很香、很好吃。
妈妈先把大龙虾洗干净，切成一块一块的，再把虾肉放在面粉里滚一下，最后放到油里炸。同时切很多的葱、姜、蒜备用。妈妈把炸好的龙虾和葱姜蒜放在一起炒。这样做出来的龙虾很香、很好吃。每次我都会吃好多。
葱姜龙虾是妈妈的拿手菜！(张舒欣 11岁)
妈妈很爱我们，她每天给我们做饭。我爱吃妈妈做的饭和菜。她喜欢给我们做不同的菜，做的蔬菜有红色的、绿色的、黄色的，配在一起，又好吃又好看，还有营养。我特别喜欢妈妈做的炒土豆丝和鱼香茄子，还有美味的色拉。妈妈说，要多吃蔬菜才健康。我爱妈妈做的菜的味道。我的妈妈很辛苦，我爱我的妈妈。(王琛琛 10岁)
(这是美国亚特兰大现代中文学校老师布置的一篇作文，题目是《妈妈最拿手的菜》。――编者注)

description.hltext_display: 图文：女子世锦赛决赛次局 阮露斐比赛中欲落子

description.content:
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日凌晨，2010年女子国际象棋世界锦标赛决赛第二局的比赛，在土耳其的安塔基亚结束了争夺，结果，中国16岁的天才少女侯逸凡后手力克队友阮露斐，总比分1.5比0.5领先，只要在后两局比赛中再取得1分就将登上“棋后”宝座。如果夺冠，侯逸凡也将成为世锦赛上最年轻的冠军得主。

description.hltext_display: Man could get prison for cable theft
description.content:
AUBURN — A 50-year-old Auburn man faces up to two to four years in prison for stealing Time Warner cable services, including adult pay-per-view movies.
Andrew Vibbert, of 35 Market St., apartment 9, pleaded guilty in Cayuga County Court Tuesday to first-degree felony identity theft for assuming another man’s identity in order to sign up for the cable service.
Time Warner work orders, which were presented in court Monday, were signed off by three different people, two of whom Vibbert admitted to posing as.
The third name was Vibbert’s.
Vibbert also agreed to pay nearly $1,000 in restitution.
The Auburn Police Department previously said a large portion of Vibbert’s cable bill included adult pay-per-view movies.
The two- to four-year sentence Vibbert was promised Tuesday will be served consecutively to any parole violation that may result from the new conviction.
Vibbert was on parole when the thefts occurred for two 2006 felony grand larceny convictions.
Sentencing is scheduled for Feb. 1.
Also in court:
• A Red Creek man pleaded guilty to second-degree attempted assault, a felony, for injuring three people when he swung a tire iron at them on Aug. 1.
Jason Kellam, 24, of 7148 state Route 104A, admitted he swung the tire iron during an incident outside of Devaney’s Riverside Grill in Brutus.
Kellam agreed to pay nearly $4,000 in medical restitution for the victims’ injuries.
Kellam faces probation when he is sentenced on Feb. 1.
• An Auburn man pleaded guilty to selling 80 milligrams of oxycodone for $120.
Trevor Walsh, 27, of 1 Sherman St., pleaded guilty to third-degree criminal sale of a controlled substance, a felony, for illegally selling the prescription painkiller on Feb. 12.
Walsh was promised his sentence will not exceed three years in prison and two years of post-release supervision.
Walsh may receive a shock incarceration or drug treatment recommendation when he is sentenced on Feb. 1.
Completion of either program would earn Walsh an early release from prison.
Cayuga County Judge Mark Fandrich also decreased bail to $2,500 cash or $5,000 bond to give Walsh a chance to get out of jail for the holidays.
Fandrich warned Walsh he faces up to nine years in prison if he gets into trouble or fails to show up for sentencing if he manages to raise money for bail.
• Robert Anderson, 26, who is currently incarcerated at the Great Meadows Correctional Facility, was sentenced to 2.5 to five years in prison for possessing a knife while in the Auburn Correctional Facility.
The sentence will run consecutively to a 14-year sentence Anderson is serving for manslaughter and attempted possession of a weapon for shooting and killing a person during a robbery in Erie County in 2003.
• Carol Netzer, 57, of 300 Seymour St., Auburn, was sentenced to five years of shock probation for the third-degree criminal sale of a controlled substance.
• Randolph Charles, 54, of 46 North St., Auburn, pleaded not guilty to violating the terms of his felony probation.
Staff writer Nate Robson can be reached at 282-2248 or nathan.robson@lee.net.
Follow him on Twitter at

description.hltext_display: 俄称下院将于年底前通过美俄新战略武器削减条约
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据外电报道，俄罗斯国家杜马高官22日表示，如果俄美新战略武器削减条约如期获得美国参议院的通过，俄罗斯下议院将于今年年底前对其加以批准。
俄罗斯国家杜马外事委员会副主席斯路特斯基(Leonid Slutsky)说：“如果美国参议院批准这个条约，我们委员会将召集紧急会议来讨论这个文件。”
斯路特斯基说：“无论怎样，拿着获得批准的条约迎接新年要好得多。”
美国参议院于21日结束了对这个历史性条约的辩论。据美联社最新消息，美国参议院22日进行了《削减和限制进攻性战略武器条约》的投票，其中有11位共和党人投了赞同票，从而使得该条约以67比28的投票结果在参议院得以通过。

description.hltext_display: Kos sidang wanita pertama RM4.5 juta
description.author: Regina Lee
description.content:
Sidang Kemuncak Wanita Pertama yang diilhamkan dan dinaungi isteri perdana menteri Rosmah Mansor mencatatkan perbelanjaan kerajaan hampir RM4.5 juta.
Dalam jawapan bertulis di Dewan Negara, Menteri Pembangunan Wanita dan Keluarga dan Masyarakat Datuk Seri Shahrizat Jalil mendedahkan perbelanjaan untuk program tiga hari itu sebanyak RM4,498,949.99.
Program melibatkan 15 wanita pertama dariapda seluruh dunia - kebanyakan yang hadir daripada negara-negara Africa - berlangsung di Kuala Lumpur pada Oktober.
Ekoran penjelasan itu, senator Syed Husin Ali daripada PKR membangkitkan persoalan kewajaran Rosmah dianjurkan oleh isteri perdana menteri sedangkan menurutnya dalam negara ini wanita pertama adalah Permaisuri Agong.
Dalam sidang media hari ini, Syed Husin yang juga bekas timbalan setiausaha agong mempertikaikan asas peruntukan sebanyak itu diberikan sedangkan tiada peranan oleh Permaisuri Agong.

description.hltext_display: 清热偏方可除口疮
description.content:
番茄粥 番茄1个，糯米50克，蜂蜜少许。将番茄洗干净，去皮取汁；糯米淘洗干净。锅内放番茄汁和糯米，加水熬成粥；再加入少许蜂蜜搅匀，即可食用。
功效：清热凉血，生津止渴。可治疗口舌生疮、口腔溃疡等症。
豆腐石膏汤 生石膏25克，豆腐100克，精盐少许。生石膏放入锅中，加水适量，煎1小时，去渣留汁。将豆腐切块放入锅中，再放入生石膏汁，上火煮沸，放入精盐调味，即可食用。
功效：清胃降火，生津润肺。适用于口疮、咽喉炎等症。 (常征)

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content:
The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said.
Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.
And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".
Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.
He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."
He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time.
"We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."
On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."
He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."

description.hltext_display: 看看其他国家是怎么治堵的
description.content:
德国：
严格的驾驶考试制度是道路交通畅通的一个重要保证。驾校学员一开始就进行“实战练习”，在车水马龙的街道上学习驾驶。路考在街道上而非空旷的野外进行，并且需要45分钟，大部分驾驶注意事项都会考到。驾照含金量高，驾车者上路的时候就不会造成太多交通问题。
城市最大限度利用路面用于汽车行驶。市内大小道路几乎都可以行驶汽车，不同的是采用速度分级。大的主干道最高时速为50公里，一些居民区的窄路时速多为30公里。由于可行驶的道路多，在堵车的时候，车流疏导起来也相对较快。
鼓励使用公共交通。为鼓励人们多乘坐公共交通，车票有各种优惠，比如日票、月票、周票、年票等，乘坐越多优惠越多。德国交通法规保证公交车优先行驶。街道上有专门的供公交车行驶的车道。十字路口有专门的公交车辆信号灯，公交车先行。 完善交通信息服务系统也是改善交通状况的重要手段。目前德国有十分之一的汽车装有卫星导航系统，这帮助汽车在阻塞的时候迅速找到最佳改道线路。德国还有一套塞车信息报告系统。在道路边，有方便的事故报告电话，事故信息被及时报告到交通信息中心，信息中心又及时在汽车广播等媒体上播报，以便让驾车者尽可能避开。在城市街道旁，常可以看到有液晶显示屏，随时显示前方的交通情况。
新加坡：
地铁线路与公交车相连，可以提供从各个组屋住宅区(政府出资兴建的大型高层居民住宅楼群)到市区、商业中心及各个旅游景点的快捷交通服务。每一个地铁站同时也是多条公交车线路的转换站，而且这些站点通常都建有人行通道与附近的组屋住宅区相连，搭有可防日晒雨淋的顶棚。在高峰期及规定的时段内，公交车辆享有专用通道。为便于跟踪调度，新加坡的大多数公交车都安装了全球卫星定位系统。新加坡还对停车作了严格规定。在市区，政府还规定大饭店都必须修建一定规模的地下停车场，不少地方也都按规定修建了高楼式的多层停车场。
使用电子道路收费系统及拥车证制度，有效控制市区车流量及车辆总体数量。新加坡于1998年开始实行世界第一个市区电子道路收费系统(ERP)，以取代自1975年开始使用的区域通行券系统或人工收费系统(ALS)及90年代初在三条主要高速公路上使用的道路收费系统。新加坡还实行车辆定额分配制。个人在购买新车时，必须首先向政府提出申请，投标购买一张有效期为10年的“拥车证”。10年期满后，驾车者无论是继续用车还是另购新车，都必须支付另外一笔费用。
纽约：
在交通流量大的路段开辟公交专用道，其他车辆未经许可不得占用，违者重罚；在交通要道，禁止公交车以外的车辆“左拐”或“右拐”；在市内繁华路段设立“拖车区”，任何时候不得停车，一旦违反即处重罚；商用货车和私家车实行分类管理，在规定时段只允许商用货车路边计时停车，私家车只能停在收费昂贵的地下车库。纽约市公交公司还经营校车业务，专供公立学校学生乘坐，享有比普通公交车更高的优先权。
其次，征收高额停车费，限制私家车。在一些闹市区，停车费用则每小时高达20美元。而且，市中心很难找到免费停车位，一旦停错位置，便处以高额罚款。私家车主也可以利用街边的停车计时器停车(每小时1美元)，但这种路边停车最多不能超过2小时，否则也会遭到重罚。纽约市政府还设立了H O V (高承载率汽车)专用车道，鼓励私家车主上下班“拼车”。这种车道只允许乘坐3人或3人以上的车子行驶。如果乘坐3人以下的车子使用这一车道，将被处以100美元以上罚款。
(《财经国家周刊》记者 葛轩 根据公开资料整理)

description.hltext_display: Çorumlu'nun başına gelmedik kalmadı!
description.content:
Halk arasında “Çorumlu’nun başına gelmez” denen durum, Çorumlu Ünal Kel’in başına geldi.
Nikahsız eşinden olan iki çocuğunu okula yazdırmak için resmi nikah yapmaya karar veren Kel, yabancı bir kadınla evli çıktı, 62 kez gözaltına alındı, 120 bin TL’lik icrayla karşı karşıya kaldı, sahte evlilikten bir kızı olduğunu öğrendi.
ÇORUMLU Ünal Kel’in (37) hayatı, nüfus bilgilerini kullanan dolandırıcılar yüzünden karardı. İskilip’te çiftçilik yapan Kel, 8 yıldır birlikte yaşadığı Münevver Kaya’dan (27) olan iki çocuğunu okula yazdırmak için resmi nikâhla evlenmeye karar verdi ve 2008 yılı Eylül ayında belediyeye başvurdu. Nüfus memurları, Kel’in 2006 yılında Tunuslu Assia Aouıssaouf’la (32) evlenmiş olduğunu belirledi. Hiç tanımadığı biriyle evli olduğunu öğrenen Kel, savcılığa suç duyurusunda bulundu. Evlilik defterindeki fotoğrafın başka birisine ait olduğu ortaya çıktı.38 gece karakolda geçtiBu olayın ardından Kel, iki yıl içinde kimlik bilgilerini ele geçiren kişilerin işlediği hırsızlık ve dolandırıcılık suçları nedeniyle 62 kez gözaltına alındı, 38 geceyi karakolda geçirdi.Adına ikamet belgesi düzenlendiğini öğrendiği Bolu, Manisa ve İstanbul’da dedektif gibi iz süren Ünal Kel, Tunuslu Assia Aouıssaouf’la evlenen kişinin onlarca sabıkası bulunan İdris C. olduğunu öğrendi. Aranan İdris C.’ye ulaşamayan Kel, savcılıkla bilgileri paylaştı.120 bin liralık icra geldi2009 yılının ocak ayından itibaren gün aşırı adliyeye ifadeye çağrılan ya da gözaltına alınan Kel’in evine bir süre sonra kredi kartı, elektrik, su, beyaz eşya ve banka kredileriyle ilgili yaklaşık 120 bin TL’lik icra geldi. İki sene süren hukuk mücadelesinden sonuç alamayan Kel, çareyi soyadını değiştirmekte buldu. Çorum Adliyesi’ne başvuran Kel, soyadını “Özügüzel” olarak değiştirdi.İki çocuğu vardı, üç olduAncak Kel’in soyadını değiştirmesi de yeterli olmadı. Yaklaşık 15 gün önce jandarma Kel’i kızını okula göndermediği için gözaltına aldı. Kel, iki çocuğu olduğunu ve ikisinin de okula gittiğini söyledi. Bunun üzerine jandarma, “Miray Kel isminde kızınız var. Okula göndermemişsiniz” cevabını verdi. Böylece Ünal Kel, bir çocuk sahibi daha oldu.
Her ay 3-4 kez gözaltım var
ÜNAL Kel, başına gelenlerle ilgili şunları söyledi: “İki senedir yaşadıklarım nedeniyle psikolojim bozuldu. Son olarak üzerime çocuk kaydedilmiş. Çocuklarım, ‘Baba bizim kardeşimiz mi var’ diye sorduklarında cevap veremiyorum. Her ay en az 3-4 kez köy meydanında jandarma ya da polis tarafından gözaltına alınıyorum. Benim ve ailemin hayatını karartan İdris C.’nin yakalanması için şehir şehir dolaşıyorum. Hem maddi hem manevi olarak dayanacak gücüm kalmadı.”
