description.hltext_display: Streit um Kormoran geht in neue Runde
description.content:
Umwelt naturkn Natur Kormoran Fischer Äsche
Die Äsche ist Fisch des Jahres 2011. Damit wird der Streit um den Kormoran, den die Fischer als Fressfeind Nummer eins sehen, neu entfacht.
Es seien noch nie so viele jagende Kormorane im Konstanzer Trichter beobachtet worden wie dieses Jahr, beklagen die Angler vom Angelsportverein Konstanz (ASV). Sie sehen dadurch die Fischbestände gefährdet. Die Äsche wurde zum Fisch des Jahres gekürt.
Als der Naturschutzbund (Nabu) den Kormoran zum Vogel des Jahres 2010 kürte, war der Aufschrei in Fischer- und Anglerkreisen groß. Ausgerechnet der schwarze, elegante Vogel wurde ausgesucht, obwohl sie ihn als großen Fressfeind von Speisefischen ansehen. Nun wendet sich das Blatt: Die Angler freuen sich über die Wahl der Äsche zum Fisch des Jahres 2011.
„Wir haben noch nie so viele jagende Kormorane im Konstanzer Trichter gehabt wie dieses Jahr“, sagt Thomas Lang, Naturschutzwart des Angelsportvereins Konstanz (ASV). Er habe im Herbst täglich bis zu 450 Vögel bei der alten Rheinbrücke beobachtet. Dort befinden sich die Kinderstuben der Fische. „Wir haben in Konstanz den einzigen Äschen-Laichplatz am ganzen Obersee.“ Nach seiner Beobachtung kommen die Fische das ganze Jahr über nicht mehr zur Ruhe. Die kleineren Kormoran-Kolonien am See seien nicht das Problem, sondern die großen Trupps, die über weite Strecken fliegen.
Neben dem ASV begrüße die Arbeitsgemeinschaft Fischartenschutz Westlicher Bodensee die Wahl zum Fisch des Jahres, sagt Thomas Lang. Die Äsche ist einer der beliebtesten Speisefische am Bodensee. Aber sie macht sich ausgesprochen rar. Im extrem heißen Sommer 2003 litt sie unter dem warmen Wasser, der Bestand ging deutlich zurück. Thomas Lang: „Die Äsche reagiert von allen einheimischen Fischen mit am empfindlichsten auf Umweltverschmutzungen.“ Durch die Reinhaltung der Gewässer sei am See ein Aufwärtstrend zu verzeichnen. Doch die Fische seien leichte Beute des Kormorans. Er werde bei der Jagd durch begradigte Flussläufe und verbaute Ufer begünstigt. „Stellen, an denen keine Bäume und Büsche am Ufer wachsen, machen es den Äschen schwer, Schutz gegen den Kormoran und andere fliegende Feinde zu finden.“ Zudem werde der Fisch beim Laichen eine leichte Beute, weil sich die Laichplätze über den flachen Kiesbänken befinden, also ganz ohne Deckung sind.
Der ASV bemüht sich um die Zucht von Äschen. So hat er dieses Jahr rund 15 000 Jungfische im See eingesetzt. Die Angler bemühen sich zudem um Ursachenforschung: Im Frühjahr sei ein Projekt zu den Laichgebieten im Trichter geplant. Thomas Lang begrüßt die Regelung in der Fußacher Bucht in Österreich. Dort arbeiteten Behörden, Fischer und Vogelschützer zusammen. Ab einer bestimmten Zahl von Brutpaaren werde der Kormoran bejagt. „Es müsste eine bodenseeweite Lösung gefunden werden“, sagt er.
Der Konflikt zwischen Fischern und Nabu hat sich dieses Jahr zugespitzt. Der Kormoran ernähre sich nur zu rund sechs Prozent von Edelfischen wie den Äschen, sagen Vogelschützer. Der Vogel bevorzuge jene Fische, die er am leichtesten erbeuten könne. Die zurückgehenden Fangerträge der Fischer führen sie vor allem auf den sinkenden Nährstoffgehalt im See zurück.
Fisch des Jahres
Fakten rund um den Kormoran

description.hltext_display: Rheinmetall hat Kaufsignal geliefert
description.content:
Empfehlungen heute, 08:46 DER AKTIONÄR
Kulmbach (aktiencheck.de AG) - Die Experten vom Anlegermagazin "Der Aktionär" raten weiterhin zum Kauf der Rheinmetall-Aktie (ISIN DE0007030009/ WKN 703000).
Mit dem Überwinden des hartnäckigen Widerstands bei 55 Euro sei zuletzt ein Kaufsignal generiert worden. Damit habe die Aktie kurzfristig Raum bis zur nächsten technischen Hürde bei 65 Euro. Mittelfristig würden die Experten sogar einen Anstieg bis zum Hoch bei 75 Euro für möglich halten
Bei einem Kursziel von unverändert 70 Euro bestätigen die Experten von "Der Aktionär" daher ihre Kaufempfehlung für die Rheinmetall-Aktie. Der Stoppkurs sollte auf 45 Euro nachgezogen werden. (Ausgabe 52/10 - 01/11) (22.12.2010/ac/a/d)

description.hltext_display: مجلس منظمة المرأة العربية يقرر اتخاذ ... إضافة أولى وأخيرة
火锅喷喷香小心“一滴香” 专家：吃多危害大
description.content:
合肥在线2010-12-22 14:59 稿源: 广州日报
将本文分享到微博:
这种增香剂纯粹化学药品配制，食用对身体有害。市场上常见的增香剂。
市民期待主管部门披露权威检测结果
只需滴入一两滴，一锅清水就变成了鲜美无比的靓汤，如此神奇添加剂有个大名叫“一滴香”。
进入冬季，打边炉的消费者逐渐增多。消费者也许想不到的是，香喷喷的火锅很可能就有“一滴香”的功劳。
记者昨日暗访一德路发现，大部分售卖食品添加剂的商店中，“一滴香”等食品添加剂赫然在列，可以随意购买。
专家表示，“一滴香”如果过量食用，会增加人体肝脏和肾脏的负担，危害健康。
调查 火锅加“飘香剂”不是秘密
“火锅底料香精，你要多少有多少，你要什么品种就有什么品种。”昨日上午，记者和报料人员同行，以采购人员身份来到越秀区一德路山海城街对面的一排商铺扫货，只见不少卖调味品的商行中，各种各样的食品添加剂琳琅满目。
细看商标名称，这些食品添加剂，不仅有“飘香剂”，还有诸如“辣椒精”、“肉味精”、“排骨味香膏”、“鸭味香膏”、“牛肉味膏”等各种添加剂。“你想要什么味道，加一小匙添加剂就能调出什么味道。”某香料商行老板说。
记者最后在一个名叫“广州市金味×食品有限公司”的店铺内支付了45元，购买了一支20厘米高的飘香剂；仔细一看，飘香剂外包装是金黄色的，在“飘香剂”3个字旁边，有一括号，写着3个小字，为“一滴香”。
听说记者是第一次进这种货并用于火锅时，老板表示，“如果用于火锅，这款产品绝对是最好的添加剂，比一般人家烹制火锅用的汤底便宜不少。比如，家庭使用的火锅料，如果在超市购买，一次就要花约10元；而这种45元的飘香剂，可以按照1比1000至5比1000的比例进行配置火锅汤，可以用约50次。”
“现在不少火锅店都用这个。”看见记者有点迟疑，该老板递上卡片说，“下次有生意可以直接给我电话，方便的话还可以送上门。这款产品从正规渠道进的，而且有QS证，这几天广州天气够冷，购买的人越来越多，绝大部分是酒楼、食肆的采购人员，也有一些麻辣烫经营户、卤菜加工商。”

description.hltext_display: Abwasser bis Theater: Das wird teurer
description.content:
Zahlreiche Dienstleistungen und Angebote in Konstanz schlagen zum Jahreswechsel auf. Stadt und Unternehmen begründen höhere Kosten mit stark ausgeweiteten Angeboten für die Bürger. Mit Rabattangeboten und Verhaltensänderungen können die Bürger zum Teil ordentlich sparen.
(dpa)
Abwasser:
Das ändert sich: Nach mehrfachen Preissenkungen in der Vergangenheit Jahren haben die Entsorgungsbetriebe keine Gebührenrücklagen mehr. Für Schmutzwasser müssen Kunden mit getrennter Erfassung künftig 1,63 Euro pro Kubikmeter bezahlen (bisher 1,47, plus 10 Prozent). Die einheitliche Abwassergebühr steigt von 2,15 Euro auf 2,47 Euro pro Kubikmeter (plus 14,8 Prozent). Dennoch liegen die Preise noch immer unter denen von 2003.
So kann man sparen: Wer weniger Wasser verbraucht, erzeugt auch weniger Abwasser. Also: duschen statt baden und bei Spül- oder Waschmaschinen auf moderne Technik setzen.
Bus:
Das ändert sich: Einzelfahrten werden um 10 Cent teurer und kosten ab 1. Januar 2,10 Euro (plus 5 Prozent), Kinder zahlen künftig 1,05 Euro (bisher 1 Euro). Die Tageskarte steigt von 3,90 auf 4 Euro. Die Preise waren zwei Jahre stabil, die Mehrkosten werden mit neuen Angeboten wie dem Sonntags- Betrieb auf der Linie 9 und mehr Fahrten auf den Linien 3 und 12 begründet. ä So kann man sparen: Monats- und Jahreskarten bleiben im Preis stabil, ebenso die Mehrfahrtenkarten. Damit sollen Stammkunden und regelmäßige Nutzer geschont werden. Mit einem 20-Fahrten-Block kostet eine beliebig lange Busfahrt weiterhin nur 1,60 Euro.
Fähre:
Das ändert sich: Auf der Fähre schlagen alle Leistungen auf, allerdings in unterschiedlichem Maße. Die Einzelfahrt für Erwachsene kostet künftig 2,60 Euro (bisher 2,50), die Überfahrt für ein Auto bis fünf Meter 10,50 Euro (bisher 10 Euro). Jahres- und Saisonkarten werden erstmals seit 2004 teuer, um 6,5 Prozent. Begründet wird die Preissteigerung mit Investitionen in die Flotte und die Anlagen.
So kann man sparen: Die Guthaben- Karte „S’ Kärtle“ ermöglicht ordentliche Rabatte. Wer mit 200 Euro auflädt, bekommt 30 Prozent Nachlass (500 Euro: 45 Prozent). Dann fallen auch die Tariferhöhungen deutlich geringer aus
Friedhof:
Das ändert sich: Der Gemeinderat hat den Zuschuss zum Betrieb des Friedhofs um ein Drittel gekürzt. Damit steigen die Gebühren zum Beispiel für ein Reihengrab (Nutzungsdauer 20 Jahre) von 2164 auf 2572 Euro (plus 19 Prozent), darin sind die Bestattung selbst und die Benutzung der Trauerhalle inbegriffen. Pro Jahr bedeutet dies eine Mehrbelastung von 20,40 Euro. Bei Wahlgräbern fällt die Steigerung etwas höher, bei Urnengräbern geringer aus.
So kann man sparen: Kaum Möglichkeiten, Urnengräber sind nur noch geringfügig günstiger. Preiswerteste Alternative ist die Urnennische (jetzt 2286 Euro für 20 Jahre).
Gebühren:
Das ändert sich: Einige Verwaltungsgebühren steigen deutlich. Die Bewohnerparkberechtigung kostet neu 30,70 Euro im Jahr (bisher 25,60 Euro, plus 20 Prozent). Eine einfache straßenrechtliche Ausnahmegenehmigung schlägt von 27 auf 27 Euro auf. Handwerker und andere Betriebe, die dauerhaft in die Fußgängerzone einfahren müssen, zahlen künftig 90 Euro im Jahr (bisher 76,60 Euro, plus 17 Prozent)
So kann man sparen: In diesem Fall eigentlich gar nicht, außer vielleicht durch Abschaffung des Autos. Wer Dienstleistungen der Verwaltung braucht, kann auf diese in der Regel nicht verzichten
Grundsteuer:
Das ändert sich: Der Gemeinderat hat den Grundsteuersatz in der vergangenen Woche von 310 auf 410 Prozentpunkte erhöht. Die Steigerung beträgt rund 30 Prozent, für ein Einfamilienhaus kann es, je nach Größe und Lage, 150 Euro im Jahr ausmachen, für eine Dreizimmerwohnung rund 70 Euro. Zahlen müssen die Vermieter, die sich die Steuer von ihren Mietern zurückholen. Die Mehreinnahmen sollen der Klinikums-Sanierung dienen.
So kann man sparen: Der Grundsteuer entgeht niemand, der in Konstanz wohnt. Drücken lässt sie sich allenfalls durch einen Umzug in eine kleinere Wohnung in einfacherer Lage.
Kindergärten:
Das ändert sich: Nach den städtischen erhöhen auch die kirchlichen Kindergärten die Elternbeiträge. Betroffen sind nur Eltern, deren Kinder Mittagessen bekommen. Pro Kind und Monat macht die Erhöhung zwischen 7 Euro und 12 Euro aus, bei einem über Dreijährigen mit Ganztagsplatz sind dies in einer Beispielrechnung knapp 5 Prozent. Die Zuschüsse der Stadt, die im Landesvergleich einen Spitzenwert in der Kinderbetreuung einnimmt, werden nicht gekürzt.
So kann man sparen: Im Prinzip kaum, allenfalls könnten Familien weniger Betreuungszeit buchen – das ist wegen des Jobs oft nicht möglich.
Kurtaxe:
Das ändert sich: Die Kurtaxe pro Person und Nacht wird von 1,50 auf 2 Euro erhöht (33 Prozent). Der pauschale Satz für Zweitwohnungs-Inhaber und Dauercamper wird von 60 Euro auf 80 Euro erhöht. Dies soll der Stadt Mehreinnahmen von 200 000 Euro im Jahr bringen. Der Satz bewegt sich im Vergleich der Städte am See auch nach der Erhöhung im Mittelfeld.
So kann man sparen: Die Kurtaxe betrifft nur die wenigsten Konstanzer Bürger, allenfalls Dauercamper. Touristen machen das Beste aus der Situation, wenn sie die in der Taxe eingeschlossenen Angebote nutzen, so etwa freie Fahrt mit dem Stadtbus.
Seehas:
Das ändert sich: Der Verkehrsverbund Hegau-Bodensee erhöht die Preise ebenfalls zum 1. Januar. Die Einzelfahrt kostet für eine Zone (zum Beispiel Konstanz-Allensbach) dann 2,15 Euro (bisher 2,05 Euro, plus fünf Prozent), für drei Zonen (Konstanz-Singen) 4,20 Euro, bisher 4 Euro. Monats-Tickets für Erwachsene und Schüler sowie Abo-Tickets bleiben auf dem Niveau von 2009.
So kann man sparen: Wer regelmäßig fährt, hat eine Monatskarte bald wieder drin. Im Abo gibt es zwölf Monate zum Preis von zehn. Wer nur zwischen Wollmatingen und Innenstadt fährt, kann auch die etwas preiswerten Fahrkarten der Stadtwerke benutzen.
Strom:
Das ändert sich: Die Stadtwerke Konstanz erhöhen wie fast alle anderen Versorger auch ihren Strompreis zum Jahreswechsel. Grund ist laut Unternehmen die höhere Umlage zur Förderung erneuerbarer Energien. Die Kilowattstunde Ökostrom für Privatkunden mit mittlerem Verbrauch kostet dann 21,86 Cent (bisher 20,86, plus 4,8 Prozent). Der Grundpreis bleibt gleich.
So kann man sparen: Konsequentes Stromsparen im Haushalt (Lichter ausschalten, Standy-By-Schaltungen vermeiden, Energiesparlampen, moderner Kühlschrank) kann die eigene Stromrechnung deutlich stärker drücken als ein Anbieterwechsel.
Theater:
Das ändert sich: Einzelkarten wurden zur neuen Spielzeit um 1 bis 1,50 Euro teurer, in der Spiegelhalle um 2 Euro (17,50 statt 15,50 Euro, plus 13 Prozent); bei den günstigsten Plätzen fällt die Erhöhung geringer aus. Das Wahl-Abo mit zehn Vorstellungen schlägt, je nach Kategorie, um fünf bis acht Prozent auf (Parkett II von 155 auf 165 Euro).
So kann man sparen: Preiswerter als Einzelkarten sind am Theater stets die Abonnements. Auf einem recht ordentlichen Platz kostet damit der Besuch einer Vorstellung gerade 12 Euro. Schüler und Studenten bekommen kurz vor knapp (15 Minuten vor Beginn) jede Karte für 6 Euro.

description.hltext_display: Learning about the State Flowers of America
description.content: Kansas was very direct with its choice. The Native Sunflower made Kansas known to the world as the Sunflower State. It is described in legislature that it is a rich historical symbol of its frontier past and its golden days ahead.The Goldenrod is mentioned many times in this article because it is one of the most common American wildflowers. Kentucky alone has 30 varieties and is not particular to which variety it defines of its official choice. Pat title holders were the Blue Grass and the Trumpet Vine (Unofficially).Louisiana enjoys the lush blossom of the Magnolia state-wide and was made official flower over a hundred years ago in 1900. For a time, Iris lovers debated for the top spot, only prevailing in having it declared as the State Wildflower in 1990.Referring back to the 1983 World Exposition, a Women's Congress parlayed the idea of creating a garland of flowers using all the state flowers – which led to the inspiration of many great states – including Maine. This put its natives into action and through a massive campaign led to the concurrence that made the Pine Cone and Tassel its representative for the "National Garland of Flowers."It is also believed that Maryland was another inspired state, which concluded their selection of the Black Eyed Susan, another very common wildflower as their delegate. As things worked out, the colors of their state flowers blended well with their other state symbols.Massachusetts passed on the Mayflower for the National Garland, a name perhaps given by the original pilgrims. Schoolchildren made this choice final as they elected the Mayflower more than twice over the Water Lily.We have mentioned Peaches and Oranges and in the case of Michigan, Apples were the choice of prominence as it added to the allure of their landscape. The Apple Blossom was made official in 1897.The Pink and White Lady Slipper was adopted by Minnesota also in congruence with the World Fair in Chicago. Just like Louisiana, Mississippi elected the Magnolia or Magnolia grandiflora and their action was also traced back to the same Fair.In 1923 Missouri had no resistance in adopting the Hawthorn Blossom as their official flower. For the state of Montana, the Bitterroot has been maintained as their choice for over a century, but it had to be elected against its minority rivals, the Primrose and the Wild Rose.Nebraska shares the honor of having the Goldenrod as state flower with Kentucky. To quote: "There is probably not a nook or corner of the state where one or more of the numerous species of goldenrod are not found. It is a native, and only a true native should be our representative. It has a long season, and nothing could better represent the hardy endurance of Nebraska's pioneers." – BrockmanNevada's Sagebrush was first included in their state emblem prior to being adopted as their State Flower. New Hampshire's choice of the Purple Lilac in 1919 equally had no resistance and neither did New Jersey's Common Meadow Violet much later in 1971.The Yucca Flower of New Mexico, early settlers fondly referred to as the Lord's Candles. It truly very visually unique and was officially legislated in 1927.The Big Apple truly comes out as one of the most fashionable as it chose the Rose, particularly the Tea Rose as its official agent. Although, the electoral process in the choice first resulted in a victory of the Goldenrod, schoolchildren re-cast their ballots years 1892 with the Rose finally getting the top plum. It was all made truly official in 1955 "in any color or combination of colors common to it."

description.hltext_display: WikiLeaks: Belarus regime is 'violent and authoritarian'
description.content:
Belarus has a "criminal regime of a violent and authoritarian nature", according to a US diplomatic assessment quoted by the Spanish daily El Pais Tuesday.
The daily was quoting confidential US diplomatic cables which had been obtained by the whistleblower website WikiLeaks.
In cables written in 2007 and 2008, US diplomats based in Minsk described Belarusian President Aleksander Lukashenko as a "dictator".
Lukashenko was a "peasant turned ideology officer", whose Soviet upbringing had brought him to believe that "the state rules the people", the cables quote a former Lukashenko aide as saying.
"As a former Soviet army political officer, the dictator understands the use of ideology as a veneer to mask the true intentions of one's actions," the source said.
Lukashenko was able to take even harsh decisions, but "he knows to stop short of allowing opponents to tie him to extra-judicial executions", he explained.
"Murder is the only sin a ruler could commit that the Belarusian people would never forgive," the source was cited by the US cables as saying.
The diplomatic cables also present Lukashenko as protecting former interior minister Yuri Sivakov and Colonel Dimitri Pavlichenko.
The two were suspected of involvement in criminal rackets, disappearances of opposition leaders and, in Pavlichenko's case, killings of crime bosses.
They may have committed "heinous crimes" on Lukashenko's behalf, US diplomats wrote.
--DPA
kv
( 234 Words)
2010-12-21-20:11:11 (IANS)

description.hltext_display: HSC Tutoring Tips for year 11 Students
description.content: Make good use of your time For many of you entering year 11, this is a timely article reminding you that year 11 is an excellent opportunity to learn your content in advance. No assessments in the preliminary year count towards the HSC, and some students take advantage of this fact by using this time to learn ahead of the pacec at school. Students who are finding the year 11 pace a bit leisurely can, in some circumstances, begin to study some of the year 12 content to ease the load when year 12 starts. For example, students can self-study or seek tutoring in Extension 2 maths – certain topics (e.g. Complex Numbers) have no overlap with Extension 1 or 2 unit, and therefore can be self-accelerated without complications. Some preliminary modules in science subjects (e.g. Physics, Chemistry and Biology) have little value in terms of relevance to year 12 content. For example, the ‘Electrical Energy in the Home' topic has almost no overlap with ‘Motors and Generators' or any other HSC Physics module. Students should first seek some honest advice (e.g. from their tutor or an unbiased school teacher) of what content is actually important / relevant to year 12, and what content isn't. This information is useful as it allows students to allocate more time towards self-study and learning ahead. The advantage is the fact that no exams or assignments done in year 11 (testing your knowledge of year 11 content) will count towards the HSC, so students can effectively ‘gain time' that their peers would not have. Collect notes, make notes and ask questions Explore your personal network to expand your collection of notes (e.g. do you have family friends who have recently completed their HSC? Try to get their notes). If you attend tutoring, ask your tutor for notes and revision materials – start gathering notes as early as you can, especially year 12 notes. In terms of self-study, it is a good idea to write down any questions you have as you read through your notes / textbook during year 11and ask your teachers when you get the chance. As year 12 comes, you will find more of your peers will be doing the same, and your teachers will no longer have the capacity or energy to answer your questions with as much detail / enthusiasm as before. Settle your plans for HSC tutoring early All reputable HSC tutoring colleges have an internally set course schedule that ensures their students cover the requirements of the syllabus comprehensively. It is always a good idea to settle on your tutoring plans early and join these programs earlier rather than later in order to avoid missing important content early in the term. (Tutoring colleges often teach at a slightly accelerated pace in order to give students familiarity to content before it is assessed, unlike at schools which assess content immediately after it is taught)

description.hltext_display: How Important Is Music To People?
description.content: Music, it's just one of those things isn't it. Every one listens to it at some point, many listen to it every day. It can make people happy, it can make them sad. It's one of the most important things we do as humans to let lose and let our emotions out. Could you imagine a world without music? How empty those bus rides in the morning would be, or what you'd do at the weekend if you couldn't go out and let you hair down to some good songs.The thing is though, is there's a lot less people making music then there was before. The whole issue of downloading has meant that a lot of people have giving up on trying to make a music career for themselves. A lot of musicians spend money out of their own pockets making a mixtape or album, only to end up giving them to people to download for free. If you were one of those people making independent music with nothing in return, would you carry on making music? Nope, my guess is you wouldn't.If music is important to you then you have to ask yourself: Where is the music scene going to be in future? While it won't be for a good few years, if the music scene keeps going the way it is then it's only going to get worse and worse. If people don't support the music they supposedly love then that music they love is going to fade away. The music industry is going to be full of people trying to make a quick buck by doing cheesy songs that appeal to kids (Who in turn try and get their parents to try and buy it).All I'm saying is if you like music then make sure you go and buy it and support your favorite musicians. Thanks.

description.hltext_display: Dental Hygienist Jobs - Training and Responsibilities
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 21, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
Becoming a dental hygienist requires you undergo at least two years of training. Many times, however, students interested in getting government or school dental hygienist jobs after graduation will go on to earn their four-year bachelor's degree. Otherwise, an associate degree is typically all that is required to work in a private dental office. Keep in mind that school is only the beginning as you must pass state board exams as well. The American Dental Association Joint Commission on National Dental Examinations writes and administers the exam. Once you pass, you are given a license and can begin searching for the perfect dental hygienist job for you.
If you think you will be interested in dental hygienist jobs, you should be someone with a caring and patient disposition. The reason for these qualifications is because dentistry is a field that many people naturally fear and feel and an aversion toward. It is far more difficult to coax an anxious patient into a relaxed state without the right personality. There are many duties you can expect to perform as a dental hygienist, and your responsibilities will be outlined here.
The specific office you work in and even the state you live in will partly determine the exact duties required of those working in dental hygienist jobs. Still, you can expect that you will review medical histories and discuss different things with patients like correct brushing, flossing, gum care techniques, and what food to avoid if the patient has sensitive teeth. You will be the person who removes plaque and tartar from patients' teeth, cleans and then polishes them. You may also employ fluoride and sealant to prevent cavities. You could be charge of taking and developing x-rays and examining the mouth for anything abnormal. In some states, dental hygienist jobs include administering anesthetic to numb the gums and teeth in preparation for the placing and removing of fillings.
Many people with dental hygienist jobs work part-time. This is typically enjoyed because the hours are flexible. If you work in a school or public health office, however, you will probably be hired full-time. Many dental hygienists work in more than one office because each office may only require a hygienist a few days out of the week. The benefits you appreciate in this kind of position vary depending on your employer. Typically, however, you can expect to receive free or discounted dental service, but usually nothing else in terms of health insurance coverage.

entity.property: American Dental Association Joint Commission on National Dental Examinations

description.hltext_display: Madhuri on what song gets her dancing
description.content:
New Delhi: Food inflation rose to 9.46 per cent (from 8.60 per cent in the last week) for the week ending on December 4 due to higher prices of essential commodities like rice, vegetables, milk and fruits.
This is the second consecutive week in which food inflation has increased.
The data was released just half an hour before the Reserve Bank of India's mid-quarterly review of the monetary policy on Thursday, in which it is expected to take stock of the inflation situation and decide on an appropriate course of action.
While prices of rice rose by 1.47 per cent, vegetables by 1 per cent, milk by 17.76 per cent and fruits by 19.75 per cent on an annual basis, pulses and wheat prices declined by 4.24 per cent and 11.46 per cent, respectively.
In addition to this, the fuel and power product index increased by 10.67 per cent on a year-on-year basis.
Furthermore, onions became costlier by 29.93 per cent on an annual basis.
Meanwhile, overall inflation declined to 7.48 per cent in November from 8.58 per cent in the previous month.

description.hltext_display: 张国强亮相跨年晚会 新剧《沈浩》明年登陆央视
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
张国强携手宋春丽亮相红地毯
张国强晚会送祝福
张国强朗诵大放异彩
实力演员张国强、宋春丽昨晚，中央电视台2010?011CCTV跨年盛典迎接美好的2011年大型晚会在深圳东部华侨城实拍录制，现场群英荟萃、两地三岸明星云集。据悉，张国强主演的主旋律电视剧《沈浩》将于明年在央视播出，借新年之际他也送上了新年送贺词，愿大家“吉星高照迎百福”。
本届央视跨年晚会阵容强大， 刘欢、宋祖英、赵本山、刘翔、冯巩、小沈阳、张国强、罗嘉良以及韩国明星张佑赫等上百位明星悉数亮相，现场演奏也是从维也纳交响乐团专程请到深圳表演。节目录制前，张国强携手宋春丽踏上红毯，两位实力演员首次在红地毯相遇，引来媒体关注。身为话剧演员出身的张国强在朗诵节目《中国报时》中大放异彩，让在场数百嘉宾为其气势所感染。据悉，该晚会将在12月31日即将跨年时段播出。届时观众将收到众星齐送的新年祝福。

description.hltext_display: 安信证券高善文：明年中国通胀最高点或在7月出现达6%
description.content:
【《财经》记者 王娟】12月22日，高善文在安信证券2011年度投资策略会上表示，汇率贬值并不确定的对应着资产价� �大幅上升，但是通货膨胀对这市场趋势的发展具有非常重大和长期性的影响；他还表示明年通货膨胀最高点或将在7月份前后出现达到6%，并且未来中国通货膨胀可能达到两位数。最后对于A股走势他认为明年很难有趋势性机会，他强调节能减排对短期经济和市场、特别是行业的影响，并认为房地产价� �下跌或是市场风� �转换的催化剂。 通货膨胀是股票市场的“情敌” 作为安信证券首席经济学家，高善文� 为在近年来准确分析预测到了资产价� �的泡沫化趋势，成为最受机构投资者关注的宏观经济分析师。
他在安信证券2011年度投资策略会上提出通货膨胀对市场的影响是相当负面的。如果要打一个通俗的比喻来阐述通货膨胀同股票市场之间的关系，可以说通货膨胀是股票市场的“情敌”，所谓的“情敌”就是先是情人后是敌人，刚开始的时候对这个市场有一些正面的支持，好像是市场的“情人”，但是用不了太长的时间，随着一系列不利� � 的积累，很快会走向市场趋势的反面。 但高善文同时指出，本轮通胀的� �心原� 是刘易斯拐点在中国出现之后，低端劳动力价� �的上涨带来的。目前我们现在处于在劳动力成本上升的中段，预计这一上升过程结束的转折点会在2014年、2015年前后。
值得关注的是，高善文分析了过去40年美元贬值与资产价� �变化的历史经验，提出主要货币的强烈贬值并不意味着资产价� �的大幅上升。从日本、德国、英国的资产价� �在过去40年美元三轮重大贬值过程中的表现可以看到，通胀才是影响资产价� �的主要� � 。通胀初期，产品价� �上升，但人力成本变化较小，导致企业盈利改善，从而对股市有正面影响。但随着通胀的恶化，迫使货币政策收紧，将导致资产价� �下降。 明年中国通胀最高点或在7月出现达6%
高善文认为如果未来新的一轮经济过热出现的话，在一些不利的条件下，通货膨胀到达两位数的水平应该是不难想象。
此后在深圳举行的某策略报告会上高善文明确表示明年前三季度通货膨胀都会处在相当高的水平，预计不会低于4%，而最高点或将在明年7月份前后出现达到6%。而四季度会出现阶段性下降，年底当月有可能下降到3%左右。 房地产价� �下跌或是市场风� �转换的催化剂 对于短期市场，高善文强调了节能减排对经济和市场特别是行业的影响。明年开春，随着节能减排压力的消失，预计工业生产会出现阶段性� 速，PPI与CPI数据会阶段性下降，贸易盈余� 速上升，银行信贷在年头也有所改善，从而对市场形成良性、有利的环境。 但是，这� �的情况很难维持，也不足以刺激市场出现重大的风� �变化。真正的风� �转换仍然要等到下半年，催化剂是房地产价� �的下跌。 【作者：《财经》记者 王娟 】 (责任编辑：刘玥) 上一篇: 超短期融资券正式推出 下一篇: 银监会明确信贷资产转让三原则

description.hltext_display: What Developments Have We Done On Nicola Tesla's Radiant Energy Generation
description.content: Way back in 1899, somewhere in Shoreham, Long Island, Nicola Tesla built a large amplifying transmitter device that could harness radiant energy from the sky and transform it into electrical energy. It was only a bad luck that his project was not fully carried out as a result of several problems involved. However, we're here to discuss what have we done with it after that remarkable event in 1899, at Shoreham, Long Island.

description.hltext_display: Blues feel Feyenoord fury
description.content:
English clubs have been labelled the 'great white sharks of football' by Feyenoord sporting director Leo Beenhakker after Chelsea agreed a deal to sign 15-year-old defender Nathan Ake.
Ake is regarded as an extremely exciting prospect for the future after coming through the youth ranks at Feyenoord and the Blues have moved to bring him in when he turns 16 in February.
Having helped to develop Ake since he was 12, Feyenoord are unhappy that they will not be able to secure his services on a professional contract.
Reports suggest the Dutch club will only receive around �228,000 in compensation for a player who could be worth millions in just a few years.
Beenhakker accepts that it was Ake's wish to move to Stamford Bridge but is disappointed with the way Premier League clubs snap up promising youngsters from abroad.
"It's driving me crazy that hot prospects are walking away from us like this," he said in the Daily Express.
"What can you do? English clubs are the great white sharks of football. Arsenal, Man United, Chelsea, they're all in the game.
"We had a wonderful deal for Nathan, but the lad wanted only one thing: Chelsea. It's game over for us.
"Premier League clubs spoil the market with their behaviour. Other clubs in Europe aren't doing these kind of things but the English sides just don't care.
"I've discussed this matter with Nathan and his parents. He told me that he really wanted to move to England and his parents were OK with his decision.
"I was impressed with Nathan's determination at such a young age but it's bad news for Feyenoord; we can't do anything about it if a foreign club comes up to sign one of our youngsters."
Chelsea have responded by saying they worked closely with Feyenoord throughout negotiations, insisting their dealings with the club were above board.
A spokesman said: "We have kept Feyenoord abreast of our interest and as such we have reached an agreement with them."
Chelsea have caused controversy in the past with their transfer policy, particularly the signing of Gael Kakuta from Lens in 2007.
Fifa initially imposed a transfer ban on the Blues over the move, ruling that the club had been guilty of inducing Kakuta, then 16, to break a contract with Lens.
This ban was lifted on appeal by the Court of Arbitration for Sport after it emerged Kakuta's contract was not valid.
Feyenoord have now called on Fifa to act to make it harder for big clubs to prise young players away from smaller clubs.
A Feyenoord spokesman said: "You have to wonder whether this is in the interest of football.
"As a club, it is difficult to act individually. That lies with Fifa or Uefa. But that is a discussion to be had - that is clear."

event_or_fact.property: he really wanted to move to England and his parents were OK with his decision.
It's driving me crazy that hot prospects are walking away from us like this

description.hltext_display: أستراليا تعيين سفيرين جديدين لها فى جزر ساموا ولاوس
How to Play Piano Songs and How to Choose an Online Piano Course
description.content: For anyone looking to learn to play piano, finding a quick way through an online course is probally the best option. Learning piano online offers value and flexibility that just aren't available with a private piano teacher. If you decide to learn piano then it is time to pick a course.Doing the research is not hard. After all, these courses are all available online. Of course, you need to have a certain skepticism while you read the sales material.But you can do it all from your computer. Which brings us to some tips you need to keep in mind:Is the website set up in a professional manner? Be sure it does. The site should inspire confidence and respect. The best sites have a complete description of their product, testimonials from real-live people who have actually used the product, and a way to contact them with any questions you have before you make a purchase.If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact them. How they respond to questions will say a lot about how they support there product.What is the target audience of the program? Some online piano courses are geared toward beginners and some toward more advanced students. While others focus on pop music and some focus on classical. Some classes are great for kids; some just aren't geared for kids. Some are aimed at the students becoming professionals, while others are more for someone doing it as a hobby. Make sure that your own personal needs and interests are met by the course you are considering. If not, move on.What learning styles are stressed? Some learn from a playful approach while others learn through memorization. Some people like to play scales and exercises; other people want to learn how to play piano songs. In my opinion, a comprehensive piano course should be suitable all sorts of learning styles. The reading of music should be taught by both and interactive game and charts. Any course worth its price will come with a thorough explanation of fingering techniques with lots of ways to practice them. There should be sound files available for you to hear what a passage is supposed to sound like, as well as the sheet music for it.You have a lot of choices when it comes to purchasing an online piano course. If you choose wisely, you will have hours and days of enjoyment learning how to play piano songs. A good course to check out would be the one recommended at Play Piano!

description.hltext_display: Katich eyes fifth Test
description.content:
Injured Australia opener Simon Katich has revealed he is set to make a shock return in time for the fifth Ashes Test, increasing the pressure on Phillip Hughes to find form in the Boxing Day meeting in Melbourne.
Katich damaged his Achilles tendon during the second Test defeat to England in Adelaide and was initially expected to miss the rest of the summer.
"I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule," Katich said.
The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be fit for the Sydney Test, starting January 3.
Hughes replaced Katich for the third Test in Perth but failed twice as Australia pulled off a series-saving win over England.
Knowing Katich is looking over his shoulder will place further heat on the out-of-form Hughes in the biggest Test of the summer.
"Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly," he added.
"I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well."
Asked if he'd be fit in time for Sydney, Katich replied: "I'm a long shot but you never know.
"You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows."

event_or_fact.property: I'm a long shot but you never know.; You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows.
I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule
Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly; I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well.

description.hltext_display: 連れ子の就職の保証人になりたくない - 多分唯一の擁護レス
DAX auf Schlussniveau erwartet
description.content:
Empfehlungen heute, 09:07 SCOACH.DE
Frankfurt (aktiencheck.de AG) - Der Leitindex DAX (ISIN DE0008469008/ WKN 846900) dürfte am Mittwoch mit leichten Gewinnen in den Handel starten, so die Experten von "scoach.de".
Darauf würden die vorbörslichen Indikatoren hindeuten. Der DAX-Future (ISIN DE0008469594/ WKN 846959), der durch den XDAX (ISIN DE000A0C4CA0/ WKN A0C4CA) berechnet werde, notiere zur Stunde bei 7.081 Punkten. Dies entspreche einem Zuwachs von 3 Punkten gegenüber dem gestrigen Schlusskurs. Am Dienstag sei das Börsenbarometer um 0,85 Prozent auf 7.078 Punkte geklettert. Die Widerstände sehe man bei 7.075, 7.101, 7.135/7.140 und 7.163/7.190 Punkten. Die Unterstützungen lägen bei 7.060/7.065 und 7.043 Punkten.
Die Vorgaben von den internationalen Börsen seien gemischt. An der Wall Street habe sich der Dow Jones (ISIN US2605661048/ WKN 969420) am Dienstag um 0,48 Prozent auf 11.533 Zähler verbessert. In Asien sei der Nikkei (ISIN XC0009692440/ WKN 969244) am Morgen hingegen mit einem Minus von 0,23 Prozent bei 10.346 Punkten aus dem Handel gegangen.
Der Euro zeige sich im frühen Handel etwas fester. Die europäische Gemeinschaftswährung koste zur Stunde 1,3130 US-Dollar. Das seien 0,24 Prozent mehr als am Dienstag.
Der Ölpreis sei am Morgen über die Marke von 90 US-Dollar gestiegen. Ein Barrel der US-Sorte WTI für die Auslieferung im Februar koste zur Stunde 90,03 US-Dollar. Das seien 21 Cent mehr als gestern Abend.
Um 10:30 Uhr würden aus Großbritannien die MPC-Minutes sowie, jeweils für das dritte Quartal, der Leistungsbilanzsaldo (Prognose: -6,5; zuletzt: -7,4) und die endgültigen BIP-Zahlen q/q (Prognose: 0,8; zuletzt: 0,8) veröffentlicht. Um 13:00 Uhr würden aus den USA die MBA-Hypothekenanträge aus der Vorwoche berichtet. Um 14:30 Uhr würden die endgültigen Zahlen zum US-BIP im dritten Quartal q/q (Prognose: 2,8; zuletzt: 2,5) folgen.
Um 16:00 Uhr kämen aus den USA der Hauspreisindex für Oktober m/m (Prognose: -0,1; zuletzt: -0,7) sowie die Verkäufe bestehender Häuser im November in Mio. (Prognose: 4,72; zuletzt: 4,43). Um 16:35 Uhr würden die US-Öllagerbestände API und EIA bekannt gegeben. Um 22:45 Uhr werde aus Neuseeland das BIP im dritten Quartal q/q (Prognose: 0,1; zuletzt: 0,2) berichtet. (22.12.2010/ac/a/m)

description.hltext_display: Қазақстанның сақтандыру нарығында оң өзгерістер қалыптасып отыр - «Еуразия» сақтандыру компаниясы Басқарма төрағасының орынбасары
description.content:
АЛМАТЫ. 21 желтоқсан. ҚазАқпарат /Ерлік Ержанұлы/ - Қазақстанның сақтандыру нарығындағы оң өзгерістер алдағы жылы да жалғасады.
Бұл жайлы бүгін Алматыдағы «Еуразия» сақтандыру компаниясы» АҚ-ның 2010 жылдың алдын ала қорытындысына арналған баспасөз мәслихатында сөз болды.
"Қазақстанның сақтандыру нарығында тікелей сақтандыру бойынша сыйақы көлемі биыл өткен жылдың сәйкес кезеңімен салыстырғанда 28 пайыздай өсті. 2011 жылы бұл тренд жалғасады. Ең үлкен сақтандыру сыйақысы ерікті жеке сақтандырудың үлесіне тиеді. Онда өсім 56 пайыздан асып отыр. Бұл сектордағы өсімнің драйвері - ерікті медициналық сақтандыру. Ал міндетті сақтандыру 15 пайызды құрады», - дейді «Еуразия» сақтандыру компаниясы» АҚ-ның Басқарма төрағасының орынбасары Назым Тульчинский.
Оның айтуынша, өсім мүлікті ерікті сақтандыру саласында да байқалып отыр. Онда бұл көрсеткіш 24 пайызды құрады. Бұл жағымды көрініс. Ерікті жеке сақтандыру нарықтың ең маңызды көрсеткіші. Айналым қаржысы шектеулі кәсіпорындар мен жеке тұлғалар үшін сақтандыру алғашқы қажеттіліктердің қатарына енбейді.
«Сақтандыру нарығы 2011 жылы сенімді түрде өседі. Даму қарқыны сақталады. Бұған екінші деңгейлі банктердің нақты кредиттеуінің өсуі өз ықпалын тигізеді. Сондай-ақ «Standart & Poor 's» халықаралық рейтинг агенттігі өткен аптада «Еуразия» сақтандыру компаниясының ұзақмерзімдік кредиттік рейтингілері мен қаржылық тұрақтылығын «ВВ-» тен «ВВ» деңгейге жоғарылатты. Компанияның рейтингі ұлттық баған бойынша да «kzA» дан kzA» деңгейге арттырылды. Бұл Қазақстанның макроэкономикалық тәуекелдіктерінің төмендегенінің айғағы», - дейді Назым Тульчинский.

description.hltext_display: TPG To Buy ProLogis Assets For 505M
description.content:
has entered an agreement to acquire a portfolio of U.S. retail and mixed-use assets, , from . The U.S. private equity investment firm will pay a total of about $505 million for the acquisition.
TPG will buy four shopping centers, two office buildings, mixed-use projects with related land and development agreements, two residential development joint ventures, Los Angeles union station, certain ground leases and other right-of-way leases. The proceeds from the offering will be used by the seller for the repayment of debt and to fund future development activity.

description.hltext_display: 日本最古の将棋盤が出土
description.content: -PR- 身分の高い武士が住んでいたとみられる島根県出雲市の高浜１遺跡で、１５世紀中期〜１６世紀初め（室町時代）の将棋盤の一部が出土し、県埋?文化財調査センターが２２日、発表した。現存する将棋盤では最古とみられ、駒２枚も見つかった。見つかったのは盤全体の４分の１に当たる板２枚しかないが、赤外線を当てると墨で引いた升目がくっきり浮かび上がった。将棋盤は江戸時代のものしか残っていない。

description.hltext_display: Cash Flow and Factoring - Workshop to be Held at the Amoskeag Business Incubator
description.author: Amoskeag Business Incubator
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Maintaining a healthy cash flow is hugely important in order for small businesses to be successful. Join Darlene Friedman, principal of The Interface Financial Group, at the Amoskeag Business Incubator (abi) for a workshop that will cover simple tips and strategies that all businesses can implement now, to improve cash flow. The presentation will also touch on cash crunch warning signs that all business owners should be aware of.The event will be held in the abi conference room on Wednesday, January 19, 2010 from noon to 1pm. This workshop is free and open to the public, but register with Jacob Bodoh at jacob@abi-nh.com or by calling (603) 629-9511. Lunch will be provided. The abi is located at 33 S. Commercial Street in Manchester, NH.Darlene Friedman is the principal of the New Hampshire office of The Interface Financial Group. IFG helps companies with cash flow challenges by offering them alternative funding options to provide them with the working capital they need to grow. Darlene is a CPA and prior to joining IFG, worked for over 20 years in public accounting providing small to medium size businesses in a variety of industries with tax, accounting and auditing services.###Simple tips and strategies that all businesses can implement to improve cash flow.

description.hltext_display: 《钢铁年代》赵锦焘盛赞剧本 对角色很满意
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
赵锦焘
史诗大戏《钢铁年代》已经被山东、北京、河南、天津四家卫视确定为 2011年开年大戏，将于明年元月1日与观众见面。近日，众主创亲赴山东为该剧宣传造势，在《钢铁年代》中饰演“工人代表”姜德久的青年演员赵锦焘在接受采访时表示《钢铁年代》是他近几年来接到的最好的剧本，姜德久也是他到目前为止最满意的角色。
“姜德久是一个非常善良，热爱文艺的青年。”赵锦焘直言姜德久是他从心底里喜欢的角色，对于姜德久的性格，赵锦焘说，“这个人物最大的特点就是很聪明，很灵活，虽然是一名钢厂工人，但他热爱文艺，尤其喜欢山东快书，在厂里非常活跃。“同时，赵锦焘还表示姜德久和生活中的他非常相似，特别是在感情方面，“因为在对待感情上，每个人的表达方式不同，我自己不太喜欢那种直白的表露，而是喜欢默默地付出，这点和戏中的姜德久很像。”赵锦焘如是说。
电视剧《钢铁年代》畅快淋漓地抒写了家国民族的传奇，打造出激情四射的铁血男人群像。对此，赵锦焘坦言《钢铁年代》是他近几年接到的最好的剧本，姜德久也是他自认为到目前为止塑造过的最好的角色，赵锦焘说，“希望在播出之时，大家能够喜欢《钢铁年代》这部戏，喜欢剧中我塑造的姜德久这个角色。”

description.hltext_display: とてもいい人なのだけれど圧迫感を感じる - ばん☆びぃな様
description.author: mr
description.content:
同僚女性の事です。
わたしは社会に出て７年目の２０代です。
その方は、余計な事は言わない、芯が強い、みんなに慕われ、仕事もきちんとする、
と私からすれば完璧な強い理想の女性です。
しかしここ数年、その方に圧迫感を感じてしまいます。
余計な事は言わない→言いにくいことはわたしに言えと仕向けてる！？
芯が強い→わたしの弱さや優柔不断さをバカにしている？
みんなに慕われている→わたしにはできない…そんなのしんどい…
仕事もきちんとする→わたし最近ミス多いなぁ…
ものすごく被害妄想だと自覚しております。
何をそこまでナーバスになる必要があるのかも分かりません。
わたしにも良くしてくれているのに、こんな事を考えてしまうなんて、
自分がとても醜く思えます。
こんな負のスパイラル、早く断ち切りたいです。
まとまりのない文章でごめんなさい。
ユーザーID：2629240071
お気に入り登録数：0
古いレス順
レス数：4本
タイトル
投稿者
ばん☆びぃな
2010年12月22日 11:04
自分でも醜い感情だと分かっているなら、なぜ直そうと努力しないのよ。
結局あなたは、彼女を尊敬しているふりを装って、自分のコンプレックスを隠したいがために愚かなすり替えをして自分の醜さを正当化したいだけ。
だったら彼女を見習ってそうなるよう振る舞って見たら？
無駄な嫉妬と相手に対する貶めは余計に心の老化を早めて、己を醜くしていくだけ。
一度、鏡を見ながらトピに挙げたような醜い感情をそのままあなたご自身にぶつけてご覧なさい。
そういう状態の時ってすごくブス顔になりますよ。
それが嫌なら、あれこれ自分勝手に妄想して相手を貶めるようなみっともない嫉妬は今すぐおやめなさい。
そういう暇があるくらいなら、何でもいいから自分磨きに時間を使いなさい。
悪いと分かっていながら、その考えを改めようとしないのは自分のことしか考えていない自己チューな証拠。
これだけ言われて、さぞかしご立腹かもしれませんが言われて腹を立てる資格はあなたにはありませんよ。
素敵な女性になりたければ、まずは嫉妬をやめましょう。嫉妬はすべての人間を醜く変えてしまいます。
ユーザーID：2184707227
サマー
2010年12月22日 12:58
自信が無い時って、そういうもんじゃないでしょうか。
あの石川啄木だって、生前まったく認められない時に
「友が皆 我より偉く 見ゆる日よ〜」
って歌を作ったくらいだし。
だから自分より「下」な相手を見て安心したいという気持ちも起こる。
同僚が、仕向けてるんじゃないか、バカにしてるんじゃないかと思うのは、そういう気持ちの現われだと思うんです。自分が今そういう思考回路になっちゃってるから。
同僚は、そんなことはまったく思ってないと思います。
あなたはあなたでいいことを、何か１つでも自信を持って見つけられるといいと思うんだけど。
例えばそういう同僚の素晴らしさを、きちんと真正面から認められるところとか。
弱さや優柔不断って悪いことばかりでもなく、人を受容したり理解するのにつながるとも思いますし。
言わなくてもいいことを言うのと、言いにくいことを言うのは、全然違うと思います。私だったら後者はむしろ尊敬します。
みんなに慕われなくてもいいというトピ主さんこそを、同僚は「芯が強い」と思ってるかも。
仕事のミスは、まあ頑張るしかないのかな（笑）

description.hltext_display: 2010 жылдың ең рейтингті оқиғасы - Қазақстанның ЕҚЫҰ-ға төрағалығы - СШИ зерттеуі
description.content:
АЛМАТЫ. 21 желтоқсан. ҚазАқпарат /Ербол Азанбек/ - Өтіп бара жатқан жылдың ең рейтингті оқиғасы - Қазақстанның ЕҚЫҰ-ға төрағалығы.
Бұл туралы бүгін Алматыда «Қазақстанның ірі қалаларындағы әлеуметтік көңілкүй» тақырыбындағы зерттеу қорытындысына арналған арнайы баспасөз мәслихатында Саяси шешімдер институының (СШИ) бөлім жетекшісі Ирина Черных айтты.
Оның сөзіне қарағанда, СШИ мен ҚР Әлеуметтанушылар және саясаттанушылар қауымдастығының дәстүрлі зерттеуіне еліміздің 16 қаласы мен облыс орталықтары қамтылған. Барлығы 2308 адам қатысқан зерттеуде респонденттердің 38,7 пайызы жылдың табысты болғандығын, 38,2 пайызы қарапайым болғандығын айтқан. Сауалнамаға қатысқандардың 24 пайызы еліміздегі ең рейтингті оқиға ретінде Қазақстаннның ЕЫҚҰ-ға төрағалығын атаған.
«Зерттеу көрсеткендей, қала тұрғындарын тек материалдық жағдай ғана емес, имидждік оқиғалар да толғандырады екен. Тұрғындардың 42,3 пайызы ЕҚЫҰ саммитінің Қазақстан имиджін халықаралық деңгейде көтеретін оқиға екендігін айтты»,- дейді И.Черных.
Астанадағы саммитті әрбір екінші қазақстандық қолдаса, сауалнамаға қатысқандардың 52,7 пайызы шараның табысты, тиімді болғандығын атап өткен. «Бұл ретте БАҚ өкілдеріне үлкен алғыс айту қажет. БАҚ тарапынан үлкен қолдаудың нәтижесінде қазақстандықтардың басым бөлігі ЕҚЫҰ төрағалығы туралы жақсы біледі. Сауалнамаға қатысқандардың тек 2,8 пайызы ғана Қазақстанның ЕҚЫҰ-ға төрағалығы туралы білмейтіндіктерін айтқан. 2009 жылдың соңында бұл көрсеткіш 40 пайыз еді»,- деді СШИ сарапшысы.
Оның айтуынша, тұрғындар ЕҚЫҰ төрағалығымен қатар биылғы жылдың ең рейтингті оқиғалары ретінде Елбасының Қазақстан халқына Жолдауын (21,5 пайыз), 2011 жылғы қысқы Азия ойындарына дайындықты (21,1 пайыз) көрсеткен.

description.hltext_display: 悪なベン・アフレックが超セクシー、公開まで待てない！2011年話題の映画『ザ・タウン』
description.content: (提供：リアルライブ) [ 拡大 ] -PR- 「パール・ハーバー」、「世界で一番パパが好き！」などで見せた美男子ぶりに「誰もが結婚したいセクシーな男」としてアメリカの女性誌などで紹介される俳優、ベン・アフレック。知的でハンサム、長身の正統派イケメンの彼が初めて街で暗躍するギャングという“汚れ役”を演じた『ザ・タウン』(2011年2月5日公開)。悪人になったベンがまたセクシーと、公開前ながら早くも話題になっている。 街の流儀に乗って代々強盗を繰り返すゴロツキたちの仲間意識と麻薬、売春、残酷な制裁に至るまで、かつては黒人俳優により演じられたブラザー・スピリット的なこの手の作品も、今や格差の進んだ白人社会を舞台に繰り広げられるのが主流。『ザ・タウン』はなにをどう間違ったか、犯罪がはびこる街(チャールズタウン)に生まれついた切れ者アウトローのタグ(ベン・アフレック)とその仲間たちの物語。ハードな犯罪を繰り返すタグは、たった一人の女性クレア(レベッカ・ホール)を愛し、人生が大きく変わっていく。荒っぽい銃撃シーン、圧倒的に迫力の?るカーアクション、スリル満点の強盗シーン、どのシーンをとっても的確なカメラワークが冴え、スピード感も?り、社会派としても娯楽作として楽しめるように作られている。 スーツや軍服を脱いで、人気カジュアル・ブランドのジャージやセーターなど、ラフなファッションに身を包んだベンもやっぱりおしゃれ。幼い?から一緒だった仲間たちと、なるべくして犯罪者となった孤独な主人公・タグはクレアとの愛で救われるのか？この?たりのストーリー展開は、女性向けで少々メロドラマっぽい。『ザ・タウン』は2011年2月5日(土) 全国ロードショー！公式サイト：www.thetownmovie.jp

description.hltext_display: الصحف السودانية : قمة الخرطوم الرباعية استهدفت دعم الثقة بين شريكى "نيفاشا"
Held at gunpoint in Somalia
description.content:
Cape Town journalists Chris Everson and Anton van der Merwe, who were arrested by security police in Somaliland as suspected mercenaries and detained for 10 days, arrived back yesterday saying they had simply ?been in the wrong place at the wrong time?. The experienced film crew, who covered violence in the Cape Flats in the 1980s and conflict in the Gulf, Afghanistan and Pakistan, say with hindsight they should have found out more about their filming assignment in Puntland, a semi-autonomous region in northern Somalia. ?We weren?t briefed on the assignment really except that it was about training of security guards. We got to Entebbe and were told ?jump on this charter?, which had a Russian crew. We didn?t even know what was on board the plane. It was a big learning curve?, sound man Van der Merwe said from his Tokai home yesterday.
The two often work for the American television network CBS?s 60 Minutes. But this assignment was commissioned by a friend and former CBS producer, Shawn Efran, who has his own film company.
They flew Kenyan Airways to Entebbe on December 8 and were due to leave on the Russian Antonov charter the same day, but were told to wait until December 10 for cargo to arrive on an SAA flight. Everson said: ?The only others on board were the six Russian crew, who couldn?t speak English. We didn?t know the flight plan, only that it was a nine-hour flight via Addis Ababa. After about three hours we landed in Hargeisa in Somaliland to refuel. ?The back of the plane was down and we were waiting. Some guys in uniform arrived and they searched our stuff, then the cargo. In the boxes were T-shirts and boots and instruments for looking under cars, innocuous stuff, not military. I didn?t know what was in the boxes; they came off the SAA plane. Then suddenly they said we were under arrest,? Everson said. The security police took them to a hotel, confiscated their cellphones, laptops and satellite phone, and instructed the hotel staff not to allow them to make or receive any calls. ?They said the T-shirts and boots were military stuff,? Everson said. The South Africans and Russians protested that hey they knew nothing about the cargo, but to no avail. ?We had no way of letting anyone know what had happened, but then Anton remembered he had a cheap throw-away cellphone he had bought in Kurdistan. There was a little store next to the hotel and we bought a sim card and airtime, so we were able to phone our families, which was golden,? Everson said. ?There was a New Zealand guy in the hotel and I scribbled a letter and said please believe me when I say what I am and I?ve got a CBS card and ID, and e-mail this to my wife.? They were restricted to the hotel, and if they went too near the gate, soldiers with AK-47s ordered them back. ?Sadly, we?d left two bottles of whiskey on the plane, because that place is dry.? Days later, Matt Bryden, co-ordinator of the UN Security Council?s Monitoring Group on Somalia, arrived to question them, at the request of the Somaliland authorities. Bryden said there was a UN embargo on transporting military goods into Somalia and the clothing on the aircraft was considered military goods. ?He said: ?You?re under arrest and you?ve been charged. If I don?t agree with your story, I will report back to them precisely that. If I say you are what you say you are, I will say that, and the problem will be solved.? After an hour-and-a-half he said he was satisfied with our story. ?I can see you are in the wrong place at the wrong time and I will communicate that to the Somali authorities. You should be out of here soon?. Then he left. ?We heard nothing until the next night; the CID guys came back and took us to an appaling place that was dark, dirty, smelly, with a bare bulb on a cord and said: ?This is where you are staying.? ?We were at a pretty low point as clearly things had taken a turn for the worse.? But after a short while, they were marched out of the building to the Safari Hotel where they were left for eight days. ?We made friends with the waiters, fine guys, and they brought us the best pawpaws and mangoes.? Meanwhile Bryden had travelled to South Africa and was in contact with the South African and Somali authorities and both men?s families. ?He was keeping us all sane. He?s the most amazing man,? he said. Ten days after their arrest, they were told they could leave.
Asked about reports that they were to film counter-piracy operations run by Saracen International, headed by Lafra Luitingh of the defunct South African mercenary company, Executive Outcomes, Everson said: ?We have no connection with them at all. We were doing a legitimate story about security training in Puntland. I?m quite sure that the people being trained were in some way connected with the piracy threat, but we don?t know who was training them.? - Cape Times

event_or_fact.property: he was satisfied with our story
there was a UN embargo on transporting military goods into Somalia and the clothing on the aircraft was considered military goods
Asked about reports that they were to film counter-piracy operations run by Saracen International, headed by Lafra Luitingh of the defunct South African mercenary company, Executive Outcomes

description.hltext_display: Les grands-parents enferment leur petite-fille dans la voiture... pour jouer au casino
description.content:
Ce sont des pleurs dun enfant qui ont alerté les agents de sécurité de ce casino, situé près de Toulon
Ils ont alors patrouillé dans le parking souterrain, avant de découvrir cette fillette, âgée de 2 ans, enfermée dans une voiture.
A laide de gestes, les agents de sécurité ont expliqué à lenfant comment déverrouiller les portes du véhicule
Cest au moment où lenfant sest retrouvée dans les bras des agents de sécurité, que la grand-mère de la fillette a fait son apparition.
Une grand-mère qui a alors expliqué quavec son mari ils étaient partis jouer au casino et navaient pas vu le temps passer
Les grands-parents, dorigine brésilienne, ont été placés en garde à vue.
Au cours de cette garde à vue, ils ont expliqué que les parents de lenfant vivaient dans un contexte social difficile et quils avaient voulu « sortir » leur petite fille de son quotidien
Une enquête pour délaissement denfant a été ouverte à lencontre des grands parents par le parquet de Toulon.
La fillette a été placée dans un foyer.

description.hltext_display: Constantin Medien Break-even in 2011?
description.content:
Empfehlungen heute, 09:13 TRADECENTRE.DE
Lichtenstein (aktiencheck.de AG) - Die Experten von "TradeCentre.de" empfehlen die Aktie von Constantin Medien (ISIN DE0009147207/ WKN 914720) nach wie vor zu kaufen.
Bernhard Burgener, Vorstandschef der Constantin Medien AG, blicke optimistisch in die Zukunft. Das einstige Sorgenkind "Sport" rund um den Sender Sport1 und das Online-Sportportal Sport1.de komme allmählich in Fahrt und sei auf gutem Wege, die Verluste deutlich einzudämmen und die Gewinnzone zu erreichen. "Wir sind zufrieden mit der Entwicklung unseres Sportsenders und sind mit unserem Portal wieder die erfolgreichste Plattform im Online-Bereich", sage Burgener im Gespräch mit "TradeCentre.de".
Beflügeln dürfte das Sportsegment die Liberalisierung des Wettmarktes in heimischen Gefilden. Entsprechende Anbieter könnten dann wieder verstärkt die Werbetrommel rühren und die Sportplattformen der Münchener befeuern. Das könnte zu einem zusätzlichen profitablen Umsatzplus führen. Zufrieden zeige sich der CEO auch mit der Entwicklung des Pay-TV Kanals Sport1 plus und der Produktionstochter Plazamedia. Die Tochter sei dank gut gefüllter Auftragsbücher erfreulich unterwegs, sage Burgener.
Die Einheiten Film und Sport- und Event-Marketing würden über die 47,3 Prozent-Beteiligung an Highlight (ISIN CH0006539198/ WKN 920299) abgedeckt. Die Schweizer würden für 2010 einen Gewinn je Aktie zwischen 42 und 44 Cent erwarten. Davon profitiere Constantin Medien anteilig. Für Highlight seien die Aussichten für das kommende Jahr gut. TEAM sei und bleibe eine Gelddruckmaschine. Das Filmgeschäft könnte durch "Wickie 2" und "Die drei Musketiere" in 3D wieder an alte Rekorde anknüpfen. Highlight werde den Gewinn sodann auch weiterhin steigern.
Der Effekt aus dem Minderheitenaufkauf von TEAM werde sich schätzungsweise mit circa 6 Cent je Aktie positiv auf das Ergebnis auswirken. Zudem werde das Unternehmen sehr wahrscheinlich keine Abschreibungen auf den Anteil von rund zehn Prozent der Aktien an Constantin Medien vornehmen müssen. Burgener habe diesen Anteil auf 1,60 Euro je Aktie abgewertet und dadurch Buchverluste erlitten. Da diese Abschreibungen 2011 entfallen würden und der Aufkauf der Minderheiten von TEAM ertragssteigernd sei, würden die Experten den Gewinn je Aktie von Highlight auf rund 50 Cent je Aktie schätzen, vorausgesetzt, dass der Euro seine Talfahrt beende. Vom guten Ergebnis der Highlight werde wiederum Constantin Medien profitieren und in den Segmenten Film- und Sport- und Event-Marketing mehr verdienen als in diesem Jahr.
Für das Jahr 2010 strebe Burgener für Constantin Medien einen Umsatz zwischen 440 und 460 Millionen Euro an. Der Ergebnisanteil der Anteilseigner werde in einer Spanne von minus 12 bis minus 14 Millionen Euro erwartet. Der Ertrag sei allerdings durch Kaufpreisallokationen auf die Beteiligung an Highlight stark belastet. Sie dürften das Ergebnis 2010 um circa 20 Millionen Euro schmälern. 2011 werde sich diese Belastung weiter reduzieren und ab 2012 weitgehend entfallen. Burgener erwarte sodann ab 2012 die Rückkehr in die Gewinnzone. Im nächsten Jahr könnte zumindest der Break-Even auf Konzernniveau erreicht oder sogar ein leicht positives Ergebnis erzielt werden.
Finanziell habe sich die Gruppe durch die Ausgabe einer Anleihe im Volumen von 30 Millionen Euro abgesichert. Sie laufe fünf Jahre und werde mit neun Prozent verzinst. Das Geld werde dazu benutzt, die Wandelschuldverschreibung im kommenden Jahr abzulösen. Die Anteilseigner hätten ab Mai 2011 die Möglichkeit, die verbleibenden 7,5 Millionen Anteile anzudienen.
Der Börsenwert von Constantin Medien belaufe sich auf 140 Millionen Euro. Alleine die Beteiligung an Highlight habe einen Wert von rund 90 Millionen Euro. Die Aktivitäten des Senders Sport1, des Sportportals und Plazamedia würden ohne Berücksichtigung der Verschuldung mit 50 Millionen Euro bewertet. Das erscheine den Experten deutlich zu wenig. Sie hätten die Aktie bereits mehrfach zum Kauf empfohlen. Inzwischen scheine sich bei Kursen um 1,60 Euro ein fester Boden zu bilden. Noch gar nicht rumgesprochen habe sich an den Börsen, dass Constantin Medien von einer Liberalisierung des Wettmarktes in Deutschland erheblich profitieren könnte.
Die Experten von "TradeCentre.de" raten unverändert zum Kauf der Constantin Medien-Aktie. (Analyse vom 22.12.2010) (22.12.2010/ac/a/nw)
Offenlegung von möglichen Interessenskonflikten: Mögliche Interessenskonflikte können Sie auf der Site des Erstellers/ der Quelle der Analyse einsehen.

description.hltext_display: كوريا الجنوبية تشيد محطة لمياه الشرب فى السودان
「ウエディングベストドレッサー賞授賞式」でマリエ、南明奈、板野友美がそれぞれ結婚観を語る!!
description.content:
「ウエディングベストドレッサー賞」を受賞した板野友美、マリエ、南明奈（写真左から） [ 拡大 ] -PR-東京ブライダルフェスタ実行委員会が、各種ブライダル企業を集めた、一般向け日本最大のブライダルイベント「東京ブライダルフェスタ2010」を、12月19日、都内で開催。最もウエディングドレスの似合う有名人を選出した「第1回日本ウエディングベストドレッサー賞授賞式」が行われ、モデル部門にマリエ、タレント部門に南明奈、アイドル部門にAKB48の板野友美が受賞し、それぞれウエディングドレス姿で登場した。同イベントは、結婚を予定しているカップルを対象に、結婚にまつわるサービスを提供するブライダル関連企業計130社以上を集め、ウエディングの最新情報を発信する展示会で、ことしが第1回目の開催となる。各企業のブース出展のほか、ステージではモデルやタレントが、ウエディングドレスを着てウエディングファッションショーなどが行われた。「ウエディングドレスは仕事でたくさん着ることが?ったので、きょうは着物を着ることができてうれしいです」（マリエ）、「ウエディングドレスっていうのは、何度着ても気持ちも上がりますし、お嫁さんっていうのは永遠の女の子の夢なので、こういった賞をもらえるのはとてもれしいです」（南）、「わたしはいつもミニスカートを着ることが多いので、ウエディングドレスを着てお仕事が出来るのはなかなかないので、こうして女の子が?こがれる衣装を着て、第1回目の賞をいただけてすごくうれしいです」（板野）とそれぞれ受賞した感想を。
授賞式後の会見でマリエは「第1回目の受賞で日本でということなので、着物を着てみました。引き振袖は初めて着たので感動してます。普通の着物より着やすくて軽いので、身が引き締まるというか、ちゃんと着物を着させていただくとやっぱりビシっとしなきゃなって思います」とコメントし、南は「学生時代のころから、結婚願望がすごく強かったし、ずっと花嫁に?こがれていて、中学のころから20歳で結婚するって言ってました。毎回、その時に付き合っていた彼と結婚すると思っていましたよね。でももう20歳を過ぎてしまったので。いま相手を頑張って探し中です。24〜25歳に結婚できたらいいなって思ってます」と明かした。
また、マリエは「わたしはいま、23歳なんですけど、結婚なんてまだ遠い話だと思ってました。いま結婚される芸能人が多いじゃないですか。だから『?れ? マリエは?』って聞かれることが多くて、もうそんな歳になっちゃったんですね〜。結婚はしたいなとは思ってますけど、ゆっくり相手を探していこうかな」と結婚についての思いを語った。
理想の結婚式について聞かれると「海で結婚式を挙げるのが夢ですね」（マリエ）、「わたしはディズニーが好きなので、ディズニーランドで挙げたいんです。でも、優樹菜さんたちが挙げたので、真似したって言われると気まずいので悩んでますけど。フジモンさんからいろいろ結婚式の話を聞いて、やっぱりいいなと思っていま考え中です」（南）、「ハワイで挙げたいです。撮影でハワイの結婚式場に行ったことが?るので、そこでいつか挙げたいですね」（板野）とそれぞれ答えた。
授賞式の後には「東京ブライダルフェスタ内 スマ婚ステージ」が行われた。土屋アンナが登場し、アコースティックライブを披露。「Brave vibration」や「Believe in Love」など4曲を熱唱した。土屋は「?まり気を重くしないで、本当に自分の人生の中で楽しめる、自分の中のフェスティバルみたいな感じで、エンジョイするのが1番だと思うんですよ。お金をかけて大変な思いをするよりも、自由に自分の好きなように、式をやって1日が疲れた〜じゃなくて楽しかったね〜っていう結婚式が1番だと思う。わたしはバーベキューしたい!ってかんじだから、楽しい1日が1番だよね」と結婚式についてアドバイスを。また「ドレス着たいですね〜。仕事で3回着てるんですけどね。ラインがきれいでシンプルなドレスが着たい。前、旦那と話してて、子供がいるからディズニーランドでやりたいねって話してました。仲間にサプライズとかやってもらいたい。仲間も子持ちが多いから子供が楽しめる式にして、面白おかしくやりたい」と理想の結婚式を語った。
ザテレビジョン でこの記事の写真を見る
